Title: project engineer
Description: nw suburbs hrengjob yahoo com project engineer cb029168 confidential custom injection molding co bs in mfg industrial or mechanical eng min 5 years plastics exp develop improve mfg processes act as liaison between co customers submit resume with salary requirements eoewe are a custom injection molding company located in the northwest suburbs of chicago il job description position summary this position will develop and evaluate new processes and improve current process capability efficiency and overall productivity in all areas of manufacturing in addition will act as a liaison between our company and the technical team of our customers will also have the ability to act as a project leader on specific projects scope supervision and interaction must have ability to deal with people at a cross functional level position requires the ability to effectively communicate in oral and written form in order to present information and respond to inquiries from employees customers and suppliers essential functions develops innovative solutions to complex engineering and manufacturing production problems through identification and implementation of advance manufacturing processes including conducting process analysis applying knowledge of product designs fabrication assembly tooling and materials conferring with suppliers and soliciting observations from the operators supervisors refines and enhances processes by applying continuous improvement and key lean manufacturing production principles and techniques to areas of production recommends product changes improvements to our customers improves manufacturing efficiency by analyzing and planning workflow space requirements and equipment necessary to perform the task coordinates input that may cross multiple teams or areas makes recommendations and implements changes assures product and process quality by designing testing methods testing finished product and process capabilities and establishing standards to confirm and validate manufacturing process requirements determines root cause of failure using statistical methods that may result in changes in design tolerances or processing methods develops fixtures for new products and processes and works with our in house tool shop to supply fixtures identifies and implements solutions for issues relating to safety quality productivity and cost reductions prepares documentation for new manufacturing processes and engineering procedures along with reports summarizing the data information and trends used to analyze the processes represents the company on specific projects leads and participates on project teams with our customers minimum qualifications bachelor s degree in manufacturing industrial or mechanical engineering 5 years manufacturing engineering experience excellent communication skills proficient with microsoft excel word powerpoint project and keycreator cad strong mechanical aptitude and ability to use measuring tools prefer lean manufacturing project management and quality systems experience source chicago tribune

ability to travel both nationally and internationally research the news anchor is responsible for gathering and researching facts as they pertain to a news story the news anchor must verify the accuracy of each story before its production on air the news anchor interviews reads investigate and follows any potential leads to produce an accurate interpretation of events he she may work with assignment editors producers writers interns photojournalists and other reporters to accomplish the story duties may include researching and interviewing for stories to be aired on t v radio print or posted on line in spanish and or english writing the news anchor is a storyteller his her aim is to write stories in language which is accurate clear simple direct and balanced the news anchor must take all the elements of a news story and write them in a manner which is objective informative and interesting writing style should capture the interest of the viewer instantly and should be followed with facts to support the news story special attention should be given to the medium i e television radio print internet and written in a manner consistent with that medium writing for a story on the internet may allow the reporter to present more facts than would be permitted for television making the writing detailed and longer he she must look for stories produce them and write them in a manner that is responsive to the needs of the community that kdtv serves the news anchor must have exceptional writing skills sentence structure diction voice delivery on camera presence and content must be free of errors duties include researching and writing for on line news articles and social media producing editing the news anchor is the producer of his her own story and when reporting on a story the news anchor edits his her own video he she must select the best video sound or text which captures the essence of the story the producer must review scripts intros and chyrons before the news anchor edits his her story all production must follow newsroom guidelines which include developing sources and contacts among public institutions government agencies and other sources critical to developing a story producing a story requires the news anchor to examine a story in a thorough but fair manner on air the news anchor is responsible for obtaining and presenting the story on air to the viewing audience he she must write review and transmit a story that is accurate credible and professional news anchors must maintain a well groomed professional appearance on off camera during working hours and at all public appearances when representing the company he she may also be required to report live in the news studio on radio or on location the news anchor must be able to assess the time needed to produce a story and adjust accordingly in order to meet deadlines news anchors present news and introduce reports live from the news set or from a live location he she must have excellent pronunciation in spanish combined with excellent spanish vocalization voice projection and spanish and english writing skills in addition to speaking in a clear and captivating manner news anchors must have an overall personal appeal to viewers news anchors must understand news values write well report from the field and participate in station events representing the station news anchors represent the professionalism and credibility of the company and their actions and reporting style should be consistent with this standard other duties as deemed necessary

Description: sikorsky aircraft corporation is a world leader in the design and manufacture of advanced helicopters for commercial industrial and military uses sikorsky helicopters are used by all five branches of the united states armed forces along with military services and commercial operators in more than 40 nations based in stratford connecticut usa sikorsky has outlying facilities in other connecticut locations as well as in florida pennsylvania and alabama sikorsky global helicopters inc located in coatesville pa has an immediate opening for a quality engineer to provide quality engineering support for assembly products on various commercial and military aircraft applications responsibilities include all activities focused on driving improvements for first pass yield on time delivery cost of poor quality escapes reject reduction and management of customer return material interface with manufacturing engineering for tooling and other process requirements provide leadership to investigate analyze and resolve problems in areas of design fabrication assembly and tooling develop monitor maintain and improve quality system processes identify and implement improvements to the quality system processes identify and establish appropriate measuring monitoring systems and metrics for performance identify chronic problems and problem areas using the various quality tools to analyze communicate and focus management attentions to the appropriate areas apply statistical process control techniques when appropriate develop control plans to identify and control key product process characteristics develop a quality system that implements and makes efficient use of operator check sheets inspection sampling audits surveillance and other appropriate quality or statistical techniques

listeners the emmis culture carries at its heart the belief that in order to succeed a company must take risks treat its people well and give them the tools they need to win you have that here including the industry ™s finest training emmis has earned this valued reputation by setting high standards for excellence while creating a fun exciting and innovative workplace where every individual is a part of the team come to work where the new business culture you thrive on is supported recognized and rewarded from the top down to the bottom up kpwr power 106 fm an emmis communications station in los angeles is searching for an experienced director of digital sales to lead the all the digital sales effort for power 106 and manage the power 106 sales staff in los angeles to achieve the station digital goals the ideal candidate will be the expert and the face of power 106 digital internally and in the advertising community power 106 has first class resources supporting its efforts “ local webmasters videographers editors and digital content management additionally power 106 has outstanding research and metrics one on one training and a management devoted to the growth and development of digital revenue here is what we need from the ideal candidate ability to provide leadership expertise and drive digital station revenue ability to lead the digital effort with all the radio account executives and sales managers lead the effort and train the sales staff in developing relationships with digital agencies to secure rfp business develop all digital sales packages selling materials and pricing for the stations ™ digital offerings ability to present the power 106 digital pre sell presentation flawlessly and passionately to any audience initiate ideas for advertisers and lead the sales process with the account executives oversee and manage all weekly and monthly digital inventory and audience reporting continually develop a list of prospects to grow digital revenue for power 106 brainstorm ideas for digital features to increase digital sales opportunities participate on bi weekly divisional digital conference calls create and maintain product and pricing guidelines for all digital offerings strong local relationships with agencies and advertisers a plus here are the characteristics we are looking for to make this an ideal fit experienced and proven track record of selling both broadcast radio and digital inventory to advertisers a self motivated assertive individual with a passion for working highly organized enjoys being in the field and on sales calls with power 106 sales people a superior communicator with interpersonal and collaborative skills proven at developing digital media campaigns with case studies highly passionate and knowledgeable about the digital space comfortable with a strategic selling approach proactive self learner with the desire to keep up with trends and skills needed to succeed in the digital space experience with microsoft ms word ms excel ms powerpoint doubleclick ando comscore photoshop and borell how you can talk with us if our description is calling you we should talk you can contact us anytime by emailing your resume to katie sorensen at ksorensen power106 com or you can fax your resume to katie 24 7 you can also snail mail your resume to the address below don ™t have a resume no problem we know some of the best candidates are already employed so just send an email to katie giving us some headlines about why you are the ideal fit all replies are held in strict confidence kpwr power 106 fm 2600 w olive ave suite 800 burbank ca 91505 attention katie sorensen by the way if what we are describing here is not you but someone you know please ask then to contact katie you ™ll be doing all of us a big favor emmis communications nasdaq emms is a diversified media corporation with award winning radio broadcasting and magazine publishing operations in markets across the country emmis is as well known for its creative culture as it is for its operations our people are aggressive knowledgeable and deeply committed to each of the communities in which we operate because employees are the key to our success emmis offers strong benefits and incentives including health dental and life insurance and a 401 k contribution plan for more information about emmis see our website at www emmis com emmis communications is an equal opportunity employer

Title: quality systems manager
Description: a quality systems manager is needed for an international manufacturing company in suburban pittsburgh this is a high profile successful organization the quality systems manager will be responsible for developing and maintaining a system to assure that all products manufactured and sub contracted meet specifications and achieve superior quality and reliability levels in collaboration with corporate qa this position is all about corrective action in the manufacturing process this is an iso environment as well a qs environment this person will utilize spc systems and lean manufacturing six sigma etc the quality assurance manager will report to the senior director of quality and they will also participate in daily production meetings and participate in all lean activities use of microsoft excel and access is warranted this is a hands on role

Title: clinical dietitian
Description: citrus valley health partners working together as a team citrus valley health partners physicians nurses and staff not only get to experience the full spectrum of life on a daily basis but they also take an active and compassionate role in the lives of each and every one of their patients as the largest health care provider for the residents of the east san gabriel valley citrus valley health partners hospitals and hospice are known regionally for birthing services high level neonatal care diabetes care and education technologically advanced cardiac services and an innovative palliative care program citrus valley health partners serves the community through the work of its four facilities citrus valley medical center inter community campus citrus valley medical center queen of the valley campus foothill presbyterian hospital and citrus valley hospice home health the result is a superior mix of sophisticated diagnostic technology and quality treatment programs administered by a family of 3 000 employees and 1 000 physicians who believe in providing the best in personalized care span reviews medical records records diet histories and assesses the nutritional status of patients teaches patients and family members the therapeutic diet and modifies the current diet to make lifestyle changes monitors patient food tolerances and intake assesses patients on parenteral and enteral feedings records the assessment on the progress note and or by computerized charting serves as a resource for medical nutrition therapy for the community bachelor of science in dietetics nutrition or related degree from an accredited college or university active membership in a national professional organization preferred i e american dietetic association american society for parenteral and enteral nutrition american diabetes association national kidney foundation american association of diabetes educators in order to maintain current knowledge and trends in the profession active participation in local and state organizations is encouraged prior experience in clinical dietetics teaching or counseling is desired registered dietitian with the commission on dietetic registration or a rde if course work has been completed and the registration examination is scheduled cb

Title: macy s aventura mall aventura fl retail loss prevention secur
Description: macy s overview as a retail security detective you will protect the assets of the company help maintain a safe business environment and monitor and enforce associate compliance to company policies and rules of conduct you will be responsible for promoting shortage prevention and awareness and conducting audits in addition you will work to detect and apprehend shoplifters and other customers who commit thefts misuse macy s credit cards and or commit other crimes on macy s premises this position leads to greater responsibilities within our security division key accountabilities complete all security training requirements and maintain personal certifications as required by law understand and maintain strict compliance with the law and company policies concerning apprehensions search and seizure and the preservation of evidence promote shortage awareness and theft deterrence among associates by conducting meetings and participating in security sponsored training events conduct audits to ensure sales department compliance to merchandise exposure standards and loss prevention recover stolen merchandise and apprehend shoplifters and other customers who commit fraud or other criminal acts against macy s investigate criminal violations against the person or property of any customer or associate committed on company premises respond to customer and associate accidents to facilitate first aide and minimize company liability prepare prompt and complete reports relative to all theft incidents merchandise recoveries accident investigations audits and other activities as assigned by the security manager testify in court concerning any case criminal or civil wherein the company is a party in interest to which the detective is summoned skills summary prior retail security experience a plus possess strong verbal and written skills ability to adapt to possible stressful and hostile situations ability to respond to alarm calls during non business hours macy s is an equal opportunity employer committed to a diverse and inclusive work environment

Title: sr analyst field services
Description: overview under general direction as a top level contributor independently formulates and defines system project scopes and objectives and devises or modifies procedures to solve complex problems macy s systems technology mst is the information technology division of macy s inc macy s inc is the nation s largest operator of department stores with over 800 department store locations in 46 states in addition we operate major catalog and internet operations for bloomingdale s and macy s macy s systems technology is headquartered in johns creek a suburban setting northeast of atlanta georgia we offer competitive salaries comprehensive benefits and a merchandise discount key accountabilities assists in the design testing debugging and documentation of complex networks equipment configurations devices programs and systems independently researches and resolves moderately to highly complex technical problems documents standards implementation procedures and troubleshooting processes may act as project manager on one or more projects competent to work at the highest technical level of all phases of specific disciplines mentors and trains the field services staff in the application of the skills necessary to support pos pc communication and other mst systems provides technical guidance and assistance to less experienced analyst and technicians skills summary bachelors degree preferred in lieu of a bachelors degree we will accept equivalent in education and or experience distribution center and retail technical experience required general operational tech support rf pc printers lan wan applications construction renovation and pos must have a minimum 4 years experience in successfully implementing mission critical information systems and meeting expected deadlines and deliverables strong interpersonal and negotiation skills must posses a high level of teamwork skills strong communication and organization skills strong customer focus sense of urgency and flexible to changing circumstances and customer needs strong analytical problem solving multitasking and time management skills strong conceptual abilities ability to coach and mentor less experienced analyst strong knowledge of pc s understanding and use of windows operating system s windows office products and communication software strong knowledge and understanding of the use of windows server operating systems experience in system backups needed experience with server hardware and support must be able to technically support ms software including word excel and powerpoint must have solid experience in lan management and lan infrastructures including cabling and connectivity and rf technology experience in logistics systems and strong troubleshooting skills strong knowledge of cisco network connectivity knowledge of telephony cabling station problem determination resolution and pbx architecture a plus knowledge of cisco 6500 4500 3500 and 2900 series switches a plus an understanding of 3270 technology helpful requires oncall and 24 7 support macy s is an equal opportunity employer committed to a diverse and inclusive work environment

engagement review utilize associate scorecards to provide recognition develop and communicate strategies to improve results observe associates twice daily through formal observations focusing on metric and behaviors to improve an individual metric ensure optimum sales floor coverage and lead selling initiatives throughout the store as needed maintain high customer readiness standards deliver function as a member of a team ability to execute plans and strategies strong leadership interpersonal and communication skills highly organized and able to adapt quickly to changing priorities opportunity employer committed to a diverse and inclusive work environment

Title: lead merchandise room coordinator macys com
Description: company profile as the fastest growing part of macy s inc business macys com is achieving record sales and broadening our workforce macys com offers the entrepreneurial culture of a web business with the stability and support of the best brand in retailing creativity and ingenuity partner with business acumen and tech savvy to build a unique business poised for substantial growth if you re interested in being a part of that growth and want to know what it s really like to work at macys com get an inside look at http ecommerce macysjobs com our employees have long term opportunities and are encouraged to utilize their supervisors and human resources for cross functional movement to further their careers at macys com we are committed to giving back to the community by partnering with local charitable organizations by skillfully combining the power of digital technology and omni channel integration with the best in retailing macys com is reaching new heights overview the merchandise room lead is responsible for leading and scheduling a team of sample merchandise coordinators to ensure photo production schedule deadlines are met on a consistent basis and the daily operation of the sample merchandise room is organized and efficient this position is also responsible for the logistics workflow and security of all merchandise samples used in photography the ability for daily lifting carrying and moving of sample product is required this position reports to the merchandise room manager key accountabilities prepare and organize photo sample inventory as assigned schedule and lead a team of sample merchandise coordinators to create and maintain relationships with merchant teams account executives photo art directors photo studios and other appropriate partners or vendors maintain a clean safe and organized work environment ensure implementation of and contribute to the development of all sample room procedures and guidelines for samples tagging tracking packing shipping inventory returns and form creation schedule coordinators for sample turn in meetings schedule pick up and delivery to studios with shippers and coordinates with studios for receiving and return shipments communicate status of projects to manager and coordinator team schedule and conduct monthly sample inventory purging with merchants remove obstacles so that coordinators meet target deadlines maintain vendor contact lists from merchants ensure zero shortage by implementing systems to ensure sample inventory is secure and trackable maintain knowledge of all areas of business vendors and samples and stay informed of all marketing projects and sample disposition for all assigned product photography projects help to train temporary help inventory shipping supplies work on special projects as assigned skills summary work experience in a photo sample room or experience with retail photography operations is desirable able to thrive in a fast paced high volume environment strong interpersonal and negotiation skills and the ability to exhibit diplomacy when handling difficult situations strong organizational and time management skills excellent listening written and oral communication skills ability to implement and follow documented procedures and guidelines ability to work independently as well as part of a team aptitude for finding creative solutions to complex problems ability to understand the overall business brand and marketing objectives proactively contributing to its evolution and success ability to carry up to 50 lbs flexible with the ability to multitask proficiency in using pc applications including excel desire to excel and be promoted within macys com macy s is an equal opportunity employer committed to a diverse and inclusive work environment

Title: macy s market place champaign il loss prevention security det
Description: overview as a macy s loss prevention security detective you ll help us protect our company s assets you will perform internal and external surveillances using our state of the art detection and investigation systems as well as put your analytical and problem solving skills to the test in resolving complex investigations working in partnership with your manager store team and fellow lp team members you will play a key role in the development and successful execution of your store s shortage program overall you ll find an environment that offers encouragement and support of your career goals and have the opportunity to be recognized as a respected member of the macy s team key accountabilities being part of an innovative approach to protecting the company s assets that emphasizes prevention and values the contributions and strengths of the entire lp team find innovative ways to successfully promote and execute your store s shortage programs and the loss prevention security process lpp learning effective surveillance and investigation techniques sharpening and improving your communication skills running department meetings to raise associate awareness in an effort to prevent the loss of our assets you ll have the ability to utilize your resourcefulness and creativity to solve complex problems discovering new opportunities for personal and professional growth skills summary minimum one year loss prevention security and retail experience stong interpersonal and administrative skills strong verbal and written communication skills comfortable using a computer ability to respond to alarm calls during non business hours high school diploma and or related criminal justice administration of justice studies preferred macy s is an equal opportunity employer committed to a diverse and inclusive work environment

Title: macy s shops at river park fresno ca retail cosmetics sales
Description: macy s overview macy s is currently seeking dynamic self motivated individuals who have a passion for make up and skin care to work in one of our most vibrant and exciting departments as a macy s cosmetic beauty advisor you will assist customers with make up and skin care selections through personal one on one interaction and the sharing of your cosmetic knowledge and expertise follow up after the sale will enable you to build lasting customer relationships and help you to achieve personal and team selling and productivity goals in order to present our customers with the best possible shopping experience retail cosmetic beauty advisors may arrive prior to store opening or remain after closing to ensure we are always ready to make macy s magic all macy s associates have the opportunity to work a flexible retail schedule which may include early mornings evenings weekends and busy events such as gift with purchase or other product related promotions while some benefits depend on the number of hours worked macy s offers competitive wages comprehensive cosmetic training and a generous employee discount of up to 20 to all cosmetic associates learn more about a career in cosmetics at macy s by visiting beauty macysjobs com this macy s location utilizes an innovative way of planning work schedules allowing an associate to participate more in managing availability and setting preferences for work times this enables our associates to address their need for flexibility in meeting both personal and work obligations details on my schedule plus are available during the interview process key accountabilities inspire the customer by making a connection and demonstrating products and techniques to create a lasting positive impression of you macy s and your line demonstrate commitment and ability to build customer relationships and loyalty through initiating service consultations regular purchase follow up and replenishment calls and the maintenance of a client file utilize customer service techniques and professional selling skills to achieve personal and team productivity goals attend and actively participate in vendor meetings seminars schools and other product knowledge and business driving opportunities maintain counter stock cleanliness and hygiene standards perform other duties as needed skills summary previous retail cosmetic sales experience a plus but not required goal driven with an ability to multi task demonstrated ability to meet or exceed sales customer service and loyalty program standards strong interpersonal organizational and communication skills ability to work as part of a team in a fast paced environment handling multiple priorities and quickly learning new procedures available to work a flexible retail schedule which may include mornings evenings weekends and extended hours macy s is an equal opportunity employer committed to a diverse and inclusive work environment

Title: macy s burlington mall burlington ma early morning retail sup
Description: overview the flex team retail support associate schedule is designed to allow macy s to flex up staffing during key events and peak selling times and allows you the flexibility to maintain your current responsibilities while earning extra money and enjoying a retail discount of up to 20 if you have a flexible availability and think that you would enjoy a fast paced retail environment then this may be the opportunity for you as a retail support associate you will work to support the delivery of the macy s customer service promise by creating a neat clean and organized shopping environment for our customers opportunities are available in the receiving and processing areas as well as on the merchandising team this position leads to a supervisory role in one of the sales support areas or to a career in sales key accountabilities expedite the receiving and processing of all merchandise unpack hang fold goods and secure security tags when necessary place merchandise on transfer equipment and deliver merchandise to departments in a timely fashion replenish merchandise on selling floor maintain stockroom organization and cleanliness deliver supplies to register bases on selling floor conduct merchandise transfers and process damages assist with merchandise floor moves and other merchandise projects as needed participate in the inventory taking process adhere to all safety and security policies and procedures share equally in the operational responsibilities of the stores skills summary demonstrates an energetic and positive attitude ability to read and interpret documents such as memos safety rules policies and procedures ability to work in a fast paced environment handle multiple priorities and learn new procedures ability to communicate effectively with peers and management a team player who possesses the ability to work in a learning environment macy s is an equal opportunity employer committed to a diverse and inclusive work environment

a macy s cosmetic beauty advisor you will assist customers with make up and skin care selections through personal one on one interaction and the sharing of your cosmetic knowledge and expertise follow up after the sale will enable you to build lasting customer relationships and help you to achieve personal and team selling and productivity goals in order to present our customers with the best possible shopping experience retail cosmetic beauty advisors may arrive prior to store opening or remain after closing to ensure we are always ready to make macy s magic all macy s associates have the opportunity to work a flexible retail schedule which may include early mornings evenings weekends and busy events such as gift with purchase or other product related promotions while some benefits in cosmetics at macy s by visiting beauty macysjobs com key accountabilities inspire the customer by making a connection and demonstrating products and techniques to create a lasting positive impression of you macy s and your line demonstrate commitment and ability to build customer relationships and loyalty through initiating service consultations regular purchase follow up and replenishment calls and the maintenance of a client file utilize customer service techniques and professional selling skills to achieve personal and team productivity goals attend and actively participate in vendor meetings seminars schools and other product knowledge and business driving opportunities maintain counter stock cleanliness and hygiene standards perform other duties as needed skills summary previous retail cosmetic sales experience a plus but not required goal driven with an ability to multi task demonstrated ability to meet or exceed sales customer service and loyalty program standards strong interpersonal organizational and communication skills ability to work as part of a team in a fast paced environment handling multiple priorities and quickly learning new procedures available to work a flexible retail schedule which may include mornings evenings weekends and extended hours macy s is an equal opportunity employer committed to a diverse and inclusive work environment

Title: macy s millcreek erie pa sales supervisor
Description: macy s overview as a sales supervisor you will support my macy s and drive sales for a specific selling area in partnership with a sales manager you will be responsible for assisting the sales manager by supervising all daily selling activities and leading a selling team in your selling area responsibilities include assisting in the selling process driving customer service through coaching and monitoring selling behaviors teaching product knowledge and communicating policies and procedures this position leads to placement as a sales manager key accountabilities sales drive and exceed sales goals by executing macy s initiatives lead the push toward selling through coaching and recognition review reports identify deficient areas and partner with sales manager to implement action plans identify best sellers and key items communicate merchandise needs to optimize the my macy s process ensure accuracy of promotional presentation communicate advertising and sales information to associates strengthen attendance and weekend hours compliance among staff motivate associates to solicit our star rewards program by reinforcing the benefits of new accounts review your personal selling area scorecard monthly for your associate turnover sales star rewards results establish high level of shortage awareness and effectiveness ensure that all policies and procedures are implemented customer coach associates to consistently deliver effective selling behaviors resulting in high customer engagement review utilize associate scorecards to provide recognition partner with outstanding shopping experience to all customers coach to associate scorecard metrics weekly through daily informal observations defining one focus metric and behaviors to improve an individual metric ensure optimum sales floor coverage and lead selling initiatives throughout the store as required maintain high customer readiness standards deliver a clean neat and easy to shop store environment people partner with sales manager to interview and employ selling focused sales associates engage in macy s recognition program reward associates with recognition cards provide input to performance evaluations ensuring associates participate in the development of individual performance improvement plans make recommendations on associate promotion advancement talent development and termination address associate concerns in a reasonable and fair manner consistent with the values expected by the company create a positive inclusive work environment resulting in retention of the best people and turnover reduction coordinate associate vacation scheduling and paid time off for sales manager s total area of responsibility skills summary demonstrated leadership supervisory skills ability to empower and develop a team ability to collaborate and function as a member of a team ability to execute plans and strategies strong leadership interpersonal and communication skills strong organizational skills and the ability to adapt quickly to changing priorities ability to anticipate and solve problems act decisively and persist in the face of obstacles commitment to exemplifying the highest integrity and professional business standards macy s is an equal opportunity employer committed to a diverse and inclusive work environment

Title: crisis specialist
Description: category professional non nursing facility midtown community mental health center department crisis intervention unit shift days hours 10 00pm 10 00am job summary the crisis specialist provides crisis intervention and support services to psychiatric consumers of all ages the crisis specialist conducts crisis mental health and subsance abuse screenings evaluates psychosocial status and needs provides daily living skills education maintains appropriate documentation provides psychiatric consultation to the wishard emergency department and medical surgical unit conducts screenings for suicide and homicide risk and screens for acute care services

Title: multi unit general manager
Description: advance your career with burger king do you possess great customer service leadership and team spirit are you looking for an opportunity to showcase your talent and take your career to the next level we want to hear from you we ™re a burger king franchise operating over 290 restaurants and are located in 5 states minnesota michigan wisconsin illinois and indiana we are looking for a customer service and results oriented general manager with an entrepreneurial spirit for the chicago heights area the general manager gm is responsible for enthusiastically leading and motivating the restaurant team in a burger king restaurant to achieve the highest levels of customer service satisfaction the gm ensures that each visit by a customer results in friendly and personalized service with great food that is promptly delivered in a clean and inviting environment the gm manages all aspects of the daily operations of a restaurant to maximize sales profits and a positive customer experience responsibilities instructs trains coaches and develops the restaurant team to create an environment where enthusiastic people are recognized and rewarded for achieving organizational and personal goals trains new management employees to develop and supervise the crew responsible for the overall recruiting and hiring of hourly employees ensures the appropriate staffing of restaurant team to maximize customer service and sales efforts works to maximizes sales and profits within the restaurant total sales responsibility approximately 750 000 to 1 25 million responsible for all cash controls and enforcement of company policies in conjunction with the district manager prepares and executes local store marketing merchandising sales and promotional efforts to increase sales volume and guest traffic responsible for ordering accounting and maintenance of all food and paper inventories assures that all safety and security procedures are followed within the restaurant qualifications 2 4 yrs restaurant supervisory or management experience previous multi unit restaurant manager experience is a plus the ability to develop train guide and lead management staff the ability to work with a high degree of independence and discretion the ability to work well under pressure the ability to work flexible hours good problem solving techniques good written verbal math and interpersonal skills good organization and time management skills valid drivers license with reliable transportation benefits we offer a competitive salary and excellent benefits including medical and dental insurance 401 k savings and investment plan paidvvacation company bonus plan career advancement opportunities for consideration and to learn more about our company go our company website at heartlandfoodcorp com

Title: district regional manager

Title: tool and die technicians
Description: yates services llc a tennessee based company providing industrial maintenance services to nissan seeks experienced tool and die technicians to work for our account located in smyrna tn qualified candidates must have a minimum of five years tool and die making or die maintenance experience and or completion of a tool and die apprenticeship responsibilities include maintaining large cast iron die by welding machining hand air grinding and other shop processes experience with die making and cnc machining is preferred selected applicants must be willing to attend unpaid pre employment training conducted on weekend weeknights in order to be considered for a position must submit to background check and drug screen positions are full time with advancement opportunity and competitive benefit package includes medical dental vision disability life and 401k starting rates of pay range from 16 70 to 27 50 depending on experience yates services llc is an equal opportunity employer and affirmative action employer of m f d v interested candidates can submit a current resume by e mail to dsmith wgyates com

Title: warehouse management trainee 1st shift up to 23 per hour
Description: warehouse management trainee – 1st shift up to 23 per hour based on experience uline – shipping supply specialists uline is a leading north american distributor of shipping packaging and industrial supplies founded in 1980 the family owned business has experienced continuous growth over the years today we employ over 2 600 bright career minded individuals across the u s mexico and canada at uline we re energetic and passionate about what we do because of our continued expansion we seek qualified candidates who share our vision values and commitment to superior customer service uline seeks 1st shift warehouse management trainees at its minnesota branch in eagan mn 15 minutes south of saint paul and 25 minutes southeast of minneapolis uline is moving to hudson wi in summer 2013 this is a great opportunity for recent college graduates to work with a successful organization and receive mentoring from an established team hours monday friday 10 30 am to 7 pm position responsibilities learn all aspects of distribution ups freight returns receiving restock and transfers through our rotational program train and develop warehouse management skills while leading and motivating others become certified on forklifts and other warehouse equipment minimum requirements bachelor s degree thrive in a fast paced warehouse environment benefits complete insurance coverage – medical dental vision life 401 k with company match generous paid time off tuition reimbursement 3 bonus programs

Title: sales coach

Title: aba counselor education
Description: general responsibilities the aba counselor education is responsible for providing educational instruction to assigned individual in a structured classroom environment designed to promote intellectual emotional and social growth he or she will assist in implementing individualized programs that are appropriate to the ages and populations served specifically children and adolescents ages 5 21 years with autism intellectually developmental disabilities and acquired brain injury the aba counselor education will typically be assigned to a classroom but may be required to work with individuals from other classrooms as assigned by supervisors populations served are intensely physically challenging the position requires that staff be aware that individual who are served may exhibit aggressive and or self injurious behavior individual served may have had multiple treatment failures prior to this placement this requires the aba counselor education to be constantly alert and ready to respond to the individual ™s needs according to effective behavior analytic interventions

Title: recruiter recruit assistant
Description: join a national award winning executive search firm that is a leader in career transition for national and international clients as a recruit assistant discover the world of business while impacting lives throughout the united states and beyond we offer an exciting and rewarding life work balance our employees are proud of their impact on both our client business partners as well as the candidates which we help we truly make a difference quality of work benefits career growth paid health insurance 401 k paid time off section 125 plan and benefit options add ons dental vision available life insurance fitness reimbursement culture of training and personal self improvement business professional culture with a relaxed exciting atmosphere peak performer awards and trips relocation costs are not covered

Title: process development techncian
Description: summary of position responsible for all phases of pilot scale catalyst preparation and execution of laboratory experiments skilled in the preparation of a broad range of catalyst types also responsible for efficient organization of his her own time careful documentation of all experiments and preparations and compliance with all safety procedures job description handle all chemicals in a safe and proper with regard to chemical properties and procedures listed on msds sheets properly dispose of waste generated by preparations and experiments follow all jm safety procedures and wear appropriate safety equipment in defined areas prepare standard catalysts in support of development programs and carry out standard calculations without supervision prepare novel catalysts in support of development programs with minimal supervision and develop procedures for novel catalysts with moderate supervision adhering to program plans and meeting quality requirements as defined by sponsor carry out non standard calculation given an appropriate example maintain clear and accurate records of catalyst preparation and experimental data use laboratory notebook or iso forms according to policy where appropriate provide summaries of data and prepare description sheets in the iso format organize time to meet deadlines for assigned work communicate with das cel pilot plant and other appropriate groups as required to adhere to work schedule clearly explain purpose of experimental work describe experimental procedures and observations and summarize results in writing perform data analysis and display using the computer utilize spreadsheets and word processing software and electronic mail maintain inventory of experimental samples responsible for accurate accounting of pgm following defined procedures carry our pilot plant responsibilities meeting requirements as defined by the supervisor operate all equipment and laboratory apparatus for catalyst preparation and experimental studies in a safe manner and keep working areas safe and clean assist in training new pcd personnel comply with all environmental health and safety federal state local regulations and company policies

Title: technical project manager mobile
Description: the ebay mobile team is looking for a motivated and organized technical project manager who has the ability to use both creativity and business sense to get the job done this role requires a candidate with a strong communications and project management skills the position will be centered around timely execution and support of impending mobile preload deals and other mobile app or platform projects this is a new role within mobile and the ideal candidate will be able to help define the parameters of the role and show flexibility with the rapid changes within the mobile industry the candidate should have experience with evaluating and supporting oem mobile preload deals from negotiations through execution as well as developing and improving business processes possesses strong project management skills project planning risk and dependency analysis and mitigation planning communication with many levels of management status updates developing key messages for execs etc demonstrates the value of being a team player through his her actions possesses strong leadership diplomatic and motivational skills ability to interact direct influence cross functional teams that span the organization self motivated and decisive excellent communication skills excellent organization skills excellent relationship management skills insists on quality deliverables has the ability to execute under accelerated timeframes has the ability to quickly adapt to change in priorities tenaciously follows up on issues and risk that may impact project success

Title: senior manager event analytics
Description: paypal is one of the largest on line financial transaction processing systems in the world growing at a torrent rate all this growth generates an enormous amount of data that is essential to our vision of changing the way in which people and businesses manage their money with over 100 million active users in 190 countries using 25 currencies the data we are collecting is a gold mine of opportunities to understand our customers and build products that make their lives better the senior manager event analytics platform will be responsible for leading the vision and defining the requirements for a next generation platform that will allow analysts and business users across paypal to interpret tracking and event data the ideal candidate will have spent significant time around web tracking analytics and analytics infrastructures and will have a strong understanding of how businesses leverage these capabilities to gain deep insight into customer behavior previous experience with product management for enterprise solutions is highly desirable as this position requires an individual with strong business acumen and experience translating enterprise needs into a product vision responsibilities work closely with business users and development teams to translate enterprise needs into a platform vision define a compelling feature road map and objectives across all phases of the development life cycle work closely with technical architects and implementation leads to understand feasibility of the platform features continually enrich your knowledge of industry advancements in tracking analytics manage a small team of business analysts technical product managers who are responsible for parts of the platform required skills must have 10 years of experience in high tech roles with autonomous responsibility for defining a vision and feature requirements for a technical solution at least 3 years experience working in web or marketing teams that supported or performed data analysis on clickstream and other event based data a proven track record of working closely with business and development teams to deliver successful projects familiarity and experience around unstructured big data analytics platform highly desired 7 years of experience with large scale data processing analytics and business intelligence experience with nosql databases hadoop cassandra redis mongodb and mapreduce 2 years of experience with big data analytics using hadoop and map reduce technologies for immediate consideration please send resumes to gcolley paypal com or apply directly to the position about paypal paypal is the faster safer way to pay and get paid online the service allows people to send money without sharing financial information with the flexibility to pay using their account balances bank accounts credit cards or promotional financing with 106 million active accounts in 190 markets and 25 currencies around the world paypal enables global ecommerce every day at paypal we are changing the way the world does business by challenging the status quo innovating and enabling business between millions of people across the globe what we do at paypal has never been done before and it has a tremendous impact we build big and new products to drive worldwide commerce be it the next mobile payments solution or a high availability money movement platform we solve problems on a scale you just can t find elsewhere paypal continues to push the boundaries of technology by investing in individuals who passionately believe in the potential of innovative technologies that make up a global market place at paypal ebay no matter which of our offices brands or locations you call home you ll discover consistent benefits that are intended to support you in your work your life your passions and your future this is where innovation meets reality are you an individual who is ready to grow and join our global community would you just like to know more about our latest and greatest projects we would love to talk to you about it more information about our other exciting positions can be found at https www jobs ebaycareers com ebay companies are proudly eeoc compliant

Title: integration engineer
Description: the integration engineer is responsible for supporting the pre sales deployment and integration of the paypal payment processing services this includes but not limited to focusing on merchants partners and developers with annual revenues from 250 thousand up to 100 million or more participating in the software development and release for the customer trouble shooting and resolving customer issues and working directly with other integration engineers systems engineers project managers qa engineers and other hardware and software vendors in the customer environment as directed by the team lead or manager responsibilities interface with customers follow instructions from the lead or manager maintain current knowledge of paypal products by creating and running demos of paypal ecommerce functionality and sample integrations maintain current knowledge of payment systems and web services strong troubleshooting debugging skills work with in windows and linux environments excellent methodical approach to isolating issues work with lead to manage conflicting requests from customers perform black box and white box testing work in engineering labs with other engineers to perform end to end testing and system integration learn new technologies and systems quickly adhere to schedules ensure 100 percent contact with all opportunities handed off to you and at least 85 percent conversion from hand off to live to site establish effective working relationships with other departments within the organization to ensure excellent information flow and feedback on process a related technical field is desired

Title: internet marketing manager
Description: at paypal we re laser focused on creating better ways for consumers and merchants to pay and get paid putting customers needs first coupled with a challenger mindset we re redefining the payments category through product marketing and service delivery innovation paypal is seeking a well rounded digital marketer to join the internet marketing team as an internet marketing manager aside from a strong background in seo and sem candidates must have a demonstrated record of quantitative and analytical rigor creative problem solving skills and strategic execution if you love debating the pros and cons of canonical tags get a thrill every time a 301 redirect goes live and the words optimize and attribution sing to you then this may be the job for you the successful candidate will play a pivotal and highly leveraged role within a dynamic high performance team conducting keyword research competitive benchmarking initiatives planning developing documenting and driving to execution detailed website recommendations evangelizing the value of seo across the enterprise building strong marketing partnerships with business stakeholders managing a team of seo and sem experts to produce results for business partners conduct expert analysis of seo efforts and results to derive actionable insights optimize seo and sem programs to not only increase rankings and relevance but also to drive traffic improve customer engagement and meet or exceed acquisition and activation goals the ideal candidate should be highly motivated with a top notch academic background and history of outstanding professional performance the position requires someone who is highly analytical motivated organized and detail oriented with the ability to work well in a fast paced dynamic environment

Title: make a difference in the life of a senior become a caregiver
Description: make a difference in the life of a senior become a caregiver thank you for your interest in becoming a caregiver with home instead senior care home instead senior care is the leading agency in non medical home care we realize that our caregivers are the most important part of our organization we offer our caregiver ™s competitive pay a comprehensive paid training program healthcare reimbursement and paid sick time we also have a yearly bonus for those who work fulltime our pay rates start at 10 24 an hour cna ™s start at 11 50 you will become eligible for up to a 1 00 an hour raise after 90 days of employment and when you are with us for a year in addition we pay the following for flat rate shifts 24 hour live in 164 00 per shift 12hr sleepover 123 00 per shift and 12hr flat rate 143 50 per shift in order to qualify for a position with our company you must live in san francisco or daly city have a photo id social security card clean criminal record no misdemeanors or felonies and one year of professional experience working with seniors if you are interested in our positions please proceed with the application process if we determine you would be a good match for our company we will call you directly to schedule an interview in our office thank you for your time and effort in applying with home instead senior care we look forward to meeting you every single day families are struggling to cope many are raising children working demanding jobs and trying to care for a senior family member advances in medicine and healthier lifestyles help seniors live longer and continue to lead more productive lives but the numbers also tell another story more and more children need to help care for their parents women especially are caught between balancing the care of their parents with piano lessons and little league for the kids a full time job church community and volunteer activities these family caregivers eventually run out of hours in the day the stress becomes too great and the balance is broken that s where you come in as a dedicated caregiversm you can help these families restore balance order and peace to their lives and help their loved ones remain at home caring for seniors is a labor of love that requires a special person with just the right touch that s why when you provide care with the home instead senior care ® network you become a caregiver with a capital care becoming a paid caregiver is a unique job with many joys and rewards as well as responsibilities and challenges both physical and emotional as a home instead caregiver you ll meet wonderful people build fulfilling relationships and make a difference in the lives of your clients

Title: managing director legal advocacy
Description: the american diabetes association has an opening for the position of managing director legal advocacy the american diabetes association is the nation s leading nonprofit health organization providing diabetes research information and advocacy founded in 1940 the association conducts programs in all 50 states and the district of columbia reaching more than 800 communities through its government affairs and advocacy division ada works to prevent diabetes improve access to quality care eliminate discrimination against people because of their diabetes and secure governmental funding for diabetes research and programs the managing director legal advocacy will develop and implement strategies to eliminate discrimination against people with diabetes at work schools correctional institutions and other places of public accommodation using the association ™s four pronged approach of educate negotiate litigate and legislate lead efforts to implement the american diabetes association ™s association strategic plan with regard to giving voice to those denied their rights because of diabetes utilize expertise in discrimination law in connection with association s expertise in science and medicine to develop and manage multifaceted strategies for combating discrimination including developing complex legal strategies position statements educational tools and model policies partner with legal advocacy volunteers including the association s legal advocacy subcommittee and its nationwide networks of attorneys health care professionals and school advocates develop plans to expand these volunteer networks and to integrate legal advocacy into other association activities manage the association ™s involvement as a party amicus curiae or ongoing advisor in litigation on behalf of people with diabetes facing discrimination serving as chief legal expert on the most high impact cases manage the development of language and legal analysis for federal and state legislation and regulation in the area of discrimination initiate and expand high level collaborations with key federal agencies responsible for the elimination of discrimination based on disability and with other diabetes disability rights education employment and correctional facility organizations ‚ ‚ provide overall management for the association ™s legal advocacy activities and serve as a member of the government affairs and advocacy management team for more information about legal advocacy at the association go to www diabetes org discrimination

incorporating spatial analytics techniques into dollar tree s existing real estate planning and new store site selection process the senior real estate research analyst will manage the market optimization and sales forecasting systems to screen markets for optimal store deployment forecast sales for specific sites and perform sales transfer analysis principal duties and responsibilities incorporate spatial analytics techniques into site selection process generate sales projections for new relocating expanding stores via thorough analyses involving the use of sales projection models an understanding of significant drivers of sales and analog store comparisons forecast cannibalization impacts on existing stores present findings in real estate committee build and maintain regression based sales forecast models manage other analysts in appropriate use interpretation and maintenance of models perform post audits of sales forecasts to continuously improve the forecasting process lead a group of analysts in executing market optimization mapping plans participate with real estate operations asset protection and sr management in developing strategies to determine the optimal deployment of new stores in a market maintain gis applications administrate sales forecasting model gis platform and manage relationship with gis and data vendors participate on cross departmental teams initiated to improve processes store productivity or investigate other real estate related issues take the lead in preparing supporting analytics where appropriate support manager by playing an active role in mentoring and developing less experienced analysts on the team ensure day to day sales forecasting duties of team are completed on the desired timelines with the highest level of quality gain market site intelligence through research and by working closely with the real estate dept foster a strong working relationship between the finance and real estate departments visit existing stores to better understand the factors impacting sales and travel with real estate group to evaluate potential new store locations prepare ad hoc real estate analyses and mapping requests for senior management minimum requirements qualifications strong working knowledge of gis and high proficiency in excel
