Title: medical assistant
Description: busy multi location allergy practice is seeking a full time medical assistant this position works directly with a physician and another medical assistant so dependability and punctuality are necessary work week is monday friday with no weekend hours but is not a 9 to 5 job need highly motivated self starter with excellent customer service skills and a minimum of 2 years previous medical office assistant experience this is over and above any externships must have valid drivers license and ability to travel within indianapolis and surrounding areas to our various offices travel is required as is reliable transportation with valid insurance coverage competitive wages and great benefits after 90 days experience in front and back office duties desired

Title: part time account manager
Description: part time account manager a local generic pharmaceutical distributor is currently seeking candidates for part time sales positions we are looking for individuals that have ability to build relationships quickly and to prospect and open new accounts the successful candidate must be able to build rapport over the telephone and be goal oriented this is an excellent opportunity for a marketing student or full time homemaker that is looking to work part time to augment the families income we offer a very competitive compensation package that includes an hourly wage plus an incentive program that rewards results this position will work 20 to 24 hours per week come join our team and start making a difference

Title: sr auditor
Description: company overview carlson is a vibrant global family owned hospitality and travel company with a strong portfolio of leading brands headquartered in minneapolis minn carlson encompasses more than 1 070 hotels in 81 countries more than 900 restaurants in 61 countries and a majority stake in carlson wagonlit travel the global leader in business travel management our business portfolio has significantly evolved over the last few years to focus on hospitality we are a global leader in that space thanks to the strengths of our hospitality and travel brands radisson ® country inns suites by carlson „ park inn by radisson park plaza ® t g i friday s ® carlson wagonlit travel cwt and our strong geographic footprint position overview we are seeking a senior auditor to join our internal audit team this position will be responsible for ensuring operational policies are enforced and financial statements and reports comply with company policy and generally accepted accounting principles gaap the person in this position will identify communicate and report on present and emerging finance and operational risks position responsibilities independently conduct and document more complex audit projects plan assigned engagements including contributing to the establishment of audit scope preparing audit programs and time monetary budgets and preparing audit team for project administer and control the engagement on a daily basis including monitoring of job status time spent and client satisfaction draft formal written documents for use in audit exit meetings and submission to senior management monitor feedback from the audit client throughout the project to assure overall project quality escalate client service issues or project obstacles to management prepare appropriate recommendations relative to control weaknesses operating and financial matters and concerns and potential efficiencies assist in performing technical accounting research travel required up to 15 20 of time position requirements bachelors degree in accounting or business cpa cma or cia required 3 years relevant experience required eoe m f d v carlson

Title: sr specialist public relations
Description: company overview carlson is a vibrant global family owned hospitality and travel company with a strong portfolio of leading brands headquartered in minneapolis minn carlson encompasses more than 1 070 hotels in 81 countries more than 900 restaurants in 61 countries and a majority stake in carlson wagonlit travel the global leader in business travel management we are a global leader in that space thanks to the strengths of our hospitality and travel brands radisson ® country inns suites by carlson „ park inn by radisson park plaza ® t g i friday s ® carlson wagonlit travel cwt and our strong geographic footprint position overview the sr specialist public relations position will support the execution of carlson s external communications and community engagement strategies serve as advocate for the business building and maintaining positive relationships with the public position responsibilities ¢ assist in the tactical execution of monthly and quarterly opportunities defined by carlson s sr director of public relations for the carlson ceo to meaningfully engage the carlson s external stakeholder community ¢ assist in the development of carlson stories scheduled on the editorial calendar to ensure a steady cadence for the telling of carlson s stories across multiple external channels ¢ establish relationships with communications colleagues across carlson s businesses to ensure consistent and steady multi way flow of information ¢ contribute to analysis of media sources distribute pertinent news to company leaders ¢ assist in coaching company representatives and company managers in effective interviews to build brand awareness and protect reputation ¢ provide assistance to corporate and field personnel on how to reach and communicate with the media ¢ develop and maintain measurement systems to track evaluate and report the effectiveness of external communications activities ¢ evaluate recommend and implement technology for media relations database tracking and reporting ¢ maintain help create media kits materials with timely updates of backgrounds biographies photo files and articles and special media web pages ¢ assist with optimizing online media materials to increase search engine optimization and exposure from media and bloggers ¢ assist with positioning key executives and company spokespersons for media placements interviews and speeches ¢ assist with writing and placing by lined articles in key media for key executives ¢ assist with responding to calls from the news media on a timely basis and follow through on calls as deadline requires position qualifications ¢ bachelor s degree public relations communications journalism or related degree ¢ 5 to 7 years corporate agency or media experience ¢ proven experience in developing collateral and assets stories messaging platforms event plans etc for effective external communications ¢ demonstrated ability to work confidently and comfortably with peers and senior level executives contributing to effective communications with diverse and global communities ¢ business intelligence understanding of company financials and balance sheets and understanding of pr and brand communications ¢ basic understanding of social media platforms how they can be deployed to effectively engage stakeholders ¢ proven writing and editing skills and the ability to create documents in microsoft office particularly excel powerpoint and word ¢ proven ability to build bridges among people and organization ¢ team player with high energy and positive outlook eoe m f d v carlson

Title: h w benefits delivery manager
Description: come work with great people and be challenged to reach your potential at ceridian we depend on highly skilled and enthusiastic achievers like you to provide innovative solutions for thousands of companies and twenty five million employees worldwide by fostering values that promote freedom flexibility and creativity we encourage professional growth and offer rewarding career opportunities ceridian provides comprehensive benefits including medical dental vision 401k with match paid time off as well as a host of other world class benefits innovate lead and grow by doing what you love to do at ceridian ceridian corporation is a leading business services company that uses reality based knowhow to help companies maximize the power of their people lower their costs and focus on what they do best providing a full portfolio of services from human resources payroll and payment solutions to benefits and health and productivity services ceridian helps organizations maximize their human financial and technology resources job summary serve as the primary senior level client service contact for enterprise clients to ensure client satisfaction retention and support growth of the assigned client base responsibilities responsible for retention client satisfaction and supporting client revenue growth within assigned base develops overall service strategy for client around service needs cost profitability components and contract specifications avoids scope creep on service delivery outside contract parameters will take ownership and responsibility for meeting client ™s expectations develops and maintains high client satisfaction by keeping client apprised of all critical situations and their status while effectively ensuring resolution and providing facilitation where required able to consistently be proactive getting ahead of issues minimizing escalations and ultimately driving and sustaining a high level of confidence from the client conducts regularly scheduled pre scheduled calls presentations and or on site client visits to review their strategic business direction and improve the account relationship and client ceridian partnership in conjunction with the account executive prepares and conducts quarterly or scheduled business reviews with clients on topics including service results trends product news education opportunities business needs etc cultivates and effectively establishes senior level relationships by understanding their strategic initiatives industry and culture able to effectively apply that knowledge and develop the relationship to identify how client s current needs apply to ceridian ™s products and services and to more effectively service the client ensures a collaborative and partnered relationship with all internal and external stakeholders monitors ongoing macro level service delivery and sla performance and interfaces regularly with client management and appropriate stakeholders on service performance identifies service disruptions and actively follow ups to ensure service stability proactively communicates service status to client participate and approves implementation readiness of new clients responsible for ensuring client readiness for new system releases product enhancements and other programs that have significant client impact effectively facilitates and interacts with client and key ceridian partners to drive prompt effective client remediation documents client interactions issues and actions per departmental guidelines using established tools processes procedures and templates as appropriate identifies ways to anticipate service issues proactively must be able to positively and assertively influence other groups to rally support for client issues effectively matrix manage build cross functional consensus client type enterprise or key client employer multiple services in h w reimbursement fsa tuition commuter hsa cobra including benefits billing large employer h w clients including responsibility for all additional cbs services including reimbursement fsa tuition commuter hsa and or cobra including benefits billing alliance partner relationships large reimbursement or cobra agent or broker relationships drive customer loyalty by cultivating and effectively establishing customer relationships at an executive and vendor manager level by understanding their strategic initiatives industry and culture able to effectively apply that knowledge and develop the relationship to identify present and consult on solutions in advance lead groups outside their direct influence and produce results in a matrixed organization while acting as the single face to the client drive continual improvement of the delivery of services from all teams ensuring a cohesive high quality service qualifications bachelor s degree or equivalent industry experience required minimum 3 years account management experience or outside related client facing experience previous outsourcing experience including reimbursement cobra retiree billing and or health and welfare a plus industry certification or affiliation with local benefits and or hr organizations desired i e sphr phr cpp cebs demonstrate outstanding interpersonal skills with an ability to drive solutions by working collaboratively with internal and external partners experience knowledge relative to human resource outsourcing solutions in medium to large size business preferred to include benefits payroll hr etc excellent presentation and interpersonal skills solid analytical skills and attention to details able to think out of the box and is action oriented can easily pose future scenarios can identify and present opportunities based on client s needs passionate about delivering high client satisfaction with an ability to adapt to different client cultures unquestionable business and personal integrity that will reflect favorably on the company both internally and externally project management skills highly desirable travel 10 40 we thank all interested candidates however only those selected for interviews will be contacted

Title: marketing content strategist internship
Description: comdata corporation a wholly owned subsidiary of ceridian is a leading business to business provider of innovative electronic payment solutions as an issuer and a processor the company enables more than 23 billion in fleet card credit card pay card and virtual card transactions annually over 1 8 million comdata cards are issued annually to over 25 000 customers and active cards at any given time total approximately 1 5 million comdata captures and reports detailed transaction data giving customers unprecedented control of their expenses other comdata solutions include truck stop point of sale pos systems regulatory compliance programs and receivables financing options job summary comdata is seeking a content marketing strategist intern job responsibilities develop strategy including specific tactics for increasing user participation through social networks analyze competitive social media landscape present recommendations for updated corporate social media policy create content calendar and bank of generic content for use across all networks assist in development of strategy for integrating comdata and svs social media assist marketing managers in creating assets specific to business units qualifications must currently be an undergrad junior or senior student or graduate student and must currently be enrolled in school studies focus on communications marketing pr business or technology full time summer internship we thank all interested candidates however only those selected for interviews will be contacted

Description: successful san diego senior living building is seeking an experienced executive director requires top business management skills and impeccable attention to all aspects of hospitality and service delivery the best candidates will have experience in the senior living and or hospitality industry rcfe license is required we offer a comprehensive pay and benefits package eoe

Description: tired of working restaurant hours that last long into the night we have a position for you amber lights tucson s premier senior living community has exciting new opportunities in our beautifully appointed dining room servers “ full time part time all shifts our servers are reliable experienced individuals who provide our senior residents with impeccable gracious tableside service join a growing well established company offering a competitive compensation plan to the very best candidates to include bonuses benefits include medical dental vision life eap 401k w match plus so much more criminal background and drug screening required equal opportunity employer

Title: sales professional senior living community
Description: inside outside sales professional senior resource group srg a nationally recognized owner and operator of premier retirement communities is now managing peninsula del rey and is seeking an experienced highly motivated sales professional who possesses the ability to achieve solid sales results the best candidate will have a proven track record in senior housing sales exceeding deposit expectations through the nurturing of leads into sales the sales professional will be responsible for marketing the community through face to face meetings telephone contacts referral groups outreach and functions with the primary goal of attracting qualified residents the qualified sales professional should possess strong relationship building skills excellent telephone skills lead management and sales techniques while employing principles to meet the needs of our senior market at least two years of sales experience needed with experience in the senior living industry preferred compensation for the sales professional will be an excellent salary plus commission eoe

Title: computer room operator
Description: monitor the as 400 mainframe system rs6000 servers and all pc’s monitors and printers in the regional full case center in 24 hours a day 7 days a week environment operator runs and monitors batch jobs and overlooks the as 400 system for abends and job locks and is expected to work quickly to resolve any computer related issues in a professional manner operator must be able to troubleshoot printing and network problems in a timely manner as well with good phone communication skills operator is often under pressure to meet deadlines producing labels and reports editing orders etc which effect the productivity of the entire rfc building the operator must be able to cope with this stress and handle the situation in a timely and professional manner operator is expected to communicate and work as part of a team of operators working 24 7 operator must communicate with third party contractors to ensure that equipment is operational at times this position will involve bending kneeling reaching standing walking on concrete and lifting up to 50 pounds other job duties may be added or deleted at the discretion of the computer room manager

Title: staff it change management and control
Description: summarya critical element to the success of e trade financial is its planning development communication and implementation of technologies worldwide in order to ensure customers are provided the highest quality products and services while minimizing risk e trade financial relies on many teams including the it change management team through one of the most advanced change management programs in the industry we are responsible for facilitating and communicating technology changes for e trade financial globally at a pace capable of meeting our fast moving business needs responsibilitiesresponsibilities for the it change management control analyst will focus on the facilitation of the process including management of changes from start to finish leading meetings managing or participating in related workflow technologies and close communication with all stakeholders ¢ managing the review facilitation communication and documentation of production change requests from planning to implementation ¢ leadership participation in change management meetings ¢ drive the resolution of open items with pertinent it teams and other stakeholders ¢ participate and or lead the management of our main change management workflow system i e remedy ¢ lead and participate in special projects ¢ secondary involvement in the daily weekly and monthly reporting of change management related reports data and statistics ¢ secondary support for training users in change management policies and procedures as well as the remedy application and crystal reports efforts as applicable

Title: large market senior client service manager
Description: this position is responsible for delivering high quality services to a wide range of corporate clients and their employees additionally the position directly supports and assists the market segment leader who is responsible for managing a staff of client service managers responsibilities include ¢ ownership of a book of clients to ensure that client needs are met in a way that improves customer satisfaction and increases profitability ¢ assisting with the coaching and mentoring of client services staff and encouraging high morale within the team ¢ providing input to be utilized in determining appropriate staffing levels to include participation in candidate recruiting and interviews ¢ ensuring corporate clients receive quality services by following departmental procedures meeting service level agreements and adhering to appropriate rules regulations and securities laws ¢ leading actions focused on continuous service and process improvements to improve competitive positioning client satisfaction productivity and work processes ¢ providing input for the development of best practices and the definition of service standards ¢ utilizing leadership and negotiation skills to build partnerships and relationships across e trade ¢ proposing initiatives that support the corporate services vision of being an innovative industry leader ¢ assisting in the development of campaigns that drive client engagement and retention ¢ assisting in the development and continuous improvement of departmental procedures ¢ ensuring procedures are clearly understood and followed by client services managers ¢ providing input and feedback as it relates to the human resource aspects of the client services managers this involves providing direction coaching and assisting the market segment leader with recruiting employee development training and performance evaluations ¢ providing direction to the team on operational issues and assistance in the resolution of escalated client problems this includes daily monitoring of work procedures and productivity ¢ evaluating client needs and maintaining regular contact with key clients in order to develop referenceable accounts ¢ maintaining excellent relationships with clients ¢ maintaining strong understanding of equity compensation practices procedures securities regulatory requirements and other processes to effectively manage responsibilities and associated risk ¢ monitoring and analyzing key quality and operational metrics to ensure high service levels and identify improvement opportunities ¢ maintaining an understanding of all products and services and assisting in defining the service experience for the client ¢ providing excellent client service focused on driving client retention ¢ assisting the client management and sales teams in educating clients about our service offering ¢ building and maintaining relationships with the client functional contacts

Title: client service representative job

Title: billing order entry manager job
Description: are you seeking an exciting opportunity to further your career with adp we are in search of a talented career minded individual to fill the position of a billing and order entry manager as the billing and order entry manager a summary of your responsibilities will be to manage the daily workflow of the billing and sales order processing to ensure that all client invoices are created accurately and according to the finance and accounting shared service centers schedule works to resolve exceptions and interprets adp roll call policy to ensure that all financial reports and sales statistics are accurate researches and resolves client billing inquiries for all adp regional centers verifies that all billing information received from regional service centers and business units is correct manages the billing associates and oversees the daily activities of the sales order entry team analyzes monthly and year to date billing and credit information in order to reduce billing errors and maximize revenue for adp establishes clearly defined department as well as individual goals and communicates them to associates through department meetings and performance planning designs and prepares recurring and ad hoc management reports that identify key indicators of operating performance creates monthly client billing files through ad hoc queries interfacing data as applicable ensures that the appropriate level of financial control exists over billing personnel and systems in order to greatly reduce the chance of revenue leakages or defalcation manages and administers all sox key controls related to the billing and order entry processes recommends and implements new processes as well as improvements automates manually billing activities where possible the ideal candidate for this position will possess prior management experience with skills in coaching and developing associates a minimum of 5 years experience within a billing environment with a proven proficiency in invoicing client activity in an accurate timely and effective manner billing managers credit supervisors collection managers strongly encouraged to apply knowledge of database structures and microsoft office suite software packages required associates degree or equivalent in education and experience bachelors degree preferred about adp automatic data processing inc nasdaq Title: sr cisco unified communications engineer job
Description: job responsibilities in this senior voip development role you will be part of a fast moving team that is responsible for the research and development of cisco based onsite telephony products solutions and services you will be asked to create design test and document these solutions such that other teams in the organization will be able to install configure and support your designed solutions this will also include the design configuration and standard definition for the network foundation these solutions reside on specific duties will include provide creative research and development engineering toward solution integration of the cisco uccm connections and uccx telephony family of products provide fourth level support to installation and support teams for technical issues ranging from call manager unity connections uccx gateways and cpe endpoints such as phones ata s and paging systems provide installation checklists sales design guides and guidance to the internal install teams perform technical training to installation and support teams on products developed review the sold physical and logical designs for adp network products and services for implementation approval qualifications required ccie voice or ccie r s preferred minimally ccvp with senior level voice systems deployment experience 7 years of experience in systems engineering network consulting or a related field including experience working as a project lead must have a demonstrated ability to perform troubleshooting of complex voice enabled environments excellent verbal and written communications skills are required with a strong internal and external customer focus must have senior level knowledge of cisco unified communications manager and the ancillary servers such as connections with these versions 8 6 x knowledge of 4 x 6 x 7 x 8 x etc must have senior level knowledge of cisco routers and switches with technologies and protocols such as tcp ip eigrp h 323 Title: home preservation spec 1
Description: please note the posting duration may be shortened based on job seeker volume ¢ hours monday friday 9am 6pm monday thursday 11am 10pm monday friday 8am 5pm limited availability responsible for providing single point of contact to borrowers whose loans are delinquent or at high risk for delinquency assist borrowers to find solutions to maintain home ownership including hamp proprietary modifications rpps etc if retention options are not possible discuss other solutions including short sales deeds in lieu etc responsible for analyzing the customer s financial situation and making recommendations on loan modifications workout options to resolve delinquency identify maintain track and log requested documentation for loan modification review notify customers of loan modification decision current status options timelines coordination touch points and customer obligations through the process ability to work department hours including overtime as business needs dictate the primary goal of the home preservation department is to mitigate loss for wells fargo home mortgage while allowing the mortgagor s to retain their home maintain applicable compliance conformity as it relates to data integrity and risk management ability to handle confidential material in a professional highly ethical manner duties include not limited to ¢ answer inbound inquiries from borrowers regarding status of the loss mitigation loan modification short sale and foreclosure process ¢ interview borrower to understand borrowers specific situation ¢ identify and request the appropriate documents required for loan modification review ¢ access information on multiple systems to inform borrowers of loan terms important dates and deadlines ¢ communicate and coordinate with multiple servicing departments both internal and external to wf informing the borrower of current status options next steps ¢ remain as the single point of contact to borrower throughout the loss mitigation loan modification and foreclosure process ¢ ensure necessary information and complete packages are received in a timely manner maintained tracked and logged in multiple systems ¢ place outbound calls to notify borrowers when additional loan document information is required ¢ follow up on loan docs ¢ notify and inform borrowers of decisions as they are made ¢ notify and inform borrowers of changes to established dates timelines throughout process ¢ work with borrower to set up work out payment plans ¢ work with borrower to set up and follow up on good faith payments ¢ work with borrower to get loan modifications signed and closed ¢ work with borrower to obtain broker information for short sale process ¢ provide information to borrowers on the escalation complaint procedures process within wf ¢ ensure borrowers understand their obligations throughout each step of process including timelines and coordination touch points with other servicing partners ¢ effectively work in a team environment in an effort to achieve team volume goals and provide superior customer service ¢ this position will support the wells owned portfolio

Description: the lending manager 4 with the national underwriting production risk management team will be accountable for managing multiple sites that handle all appraisal underwriting condominium and cooperative lending functions for wells fargo home mortgage the senior level mortgage leader will be responsible for setting the strategic direction for the team identifying process improvement opportunities and developing leaders within the collateral organization in general a lending manager 4 is responsible for managing lending activities for multiple larger business units or departments functions include ¢ approving loans in excess of unit department level authorities ¢ ensuring conformity with bank policies and procedures ¢ monitoring of delinquency loss and risk rating accuracy ¢ assisting relationship managers with structuring pricing and documentation of individual loan transactions ¢ monitoring and reviewing staffs loan underwriting and portfolio management performance ¢ planning organizing and directing managers and staff in accomplishing business goals ¢ developing and analyzing new business prospects ¢ managing on going account relationships ¢ may be responsible for preparing or reviewing reports provided to senior management regarding portfolio performance ¢ may also be responsible for reviewing and approving workout strategies for individual problem loans

Title: store manager safe 2
Description: manages retail sales and service function the primary goal is to serve the customers total financial service needs resulting in greater market share wallet share and profitability this is accomplished by creating a vital sales and service organization promoting teamwork with partners and other corporate departments creates trains and coaches a successful sales team through the development of staff as a competitive advantage responsible for effective staff salary administration and rewards develops and administers budgets business development goals and objectives staffing models schedules and performance standards guidelines the store manager level is determined by valuing a number of key store measurements this position requires compliance with the s a f e mortgage licensing act of 2008 and all related regulations ï¿½ongoing employment is contingent upon meeting all such requirements including acceptable background investigation results

Title: personal banker safe 1
Description: our vision is to satisfy all our customers financial needs help them succeed financially be known as one of america s great companies and the number one financial services provider in each of our markets come join us as a personal banker you will devote much of your day to building long term relationships with our customers in person and by phone you will deepen the understanding of our customers financial needs and provide suggestions while most of the job is performed in the stores bankers reach out into the community by placing outbound phone calls to existing clients visiting businesses conducting educational seminars and being active in the community our expectation of our personal bankers personal bankers are expected to exceed challenging sales and referral goals by proactively selling products and services to customers and referring customers to other areas of the bank personal bankers sell retail banking products and services to customers and prospects manages customer portfolio services relationships and cross sells all products and services provides broad base of financial and credit services with the goals of acquiring 100 of the customers business develops and maintains relationships with wells fargo partners to maximize sales opportunities and achieve minimum sales standards uses profiling analysis tools to identify cross sell opportunities and makes outbound sales calls typically by phone to increase product per customer ratio may handle cash transactions may spend up to 30 of time completing service related tasks every banker has their own scorecard with daily sales and referral goals you will be rewarded for your success with bonus incentives beyond base salary our best bankers constantly go the extra mile finding ways to be helpful while still working quickly and efficiently bankers have the ability to resolve difficult customer situations effectively while delivering friendly customer service and ensuring the highest level of customer satisfaction at wells fargo we have an outstanding diverse team we want people who pitch in and help others enhance their ability to educate our customers we ll provide outstanding training but it s up to you to learn our products and services personal bankers will develop and improve their skills through regular feedback discussions with supervisors and learn skills which will help further their professional experience and improve their chance for even greater roles in the future this position requires compliance with the s a f e mortgage licensing act of 2008 and all related regulations ongoing employment is contingent upon meeting all such requirements including acceptable background investigation results

Title: lending manager 3
Description: the collateral and program production risk management team within wells fargo home mortgage is seeking a strong mortgage operations leader with experience in condominium project review or cooperative underwriting the role will be responsible for managing lending activities for multiple business units or departments functions include ¢ approving loans in excess of unit department level authorities ¢ ensuring conformity with bank policies and procedures ¢ monitoring of delinquency loss and risk rating accuracy ¢ assisting relationship managers with structuring pricing and documentation of individual loan transactions ¢ monitoring and reviewing staffs loan underwriting and portfolio management performance ¢ planning organizing and directing managers and staff in accomplishing business goals ¢ developing and analyzing new business prospects ¢ managing on going account relationships ¢ may be responsible for preparing or reviewing reports provided to senior management regarding portfolio performance ¢ may also be responsible for reviewing and approving workout strategies for individual problem loans

Title: inbound sales spec safe 1
Description: an inbound sales specialist aka sales banker will engage every customer by phone with information and suggestions for new financial products or services and are focused on satisfying all of wells fargos customers financial needs they achieve 100 of their goals for daily core solutions sales goals are also measured by the service quality of sales offered to customers and include consistently meeting all compliance regulations and identification guidelines successful sales bankers will have the drive to achieve the highest level of performance platinum or gold without sacrificing customer service and are never satisfied with only copper or silver performance while much of the job is responding to inbound calls the most productive sales bankers also proactively reach out to customers who previously expressed an interest in a product or service high performers also demonstrate solid knowledge of the financial products and services offered by wells fargo including home equity loans certificate of deposits savings and other types of accounts as well as insurance offerings we provide our sales bankers with continuous coaching and development which not only enhances their ability to provide exemplary service and product solutions to our customers but also enhances the sales bankers career growth our successful bankers demonstrate self motivation a positive attitude have the ability to work well on a team and have a solid work history they also demonstrate strong listening written and verbal communication skills they are receptive to coaching and feedback have the desire to meet exceed goals and solve problems while working in a fast paced environment our sales bankers play a critical role in our customers lives therefore predictable and reliable attendance is an essential function of the position this position requires compliance with the s a f e mortgage licensing act of 2008 and all related regulations ongoing employment is contingent upon meeting all such requirements including acceptable background investigation results

Title: loan documentation specialist 4 home loan processor
Description: this role supports home mortgage consultants in the processing of wells fargo home mortgage loans along with regular interaction with wf customers duties include interpreting policies while analyzing applications property specs and documentation ordering all required verifications and conducting follow up with the customer or internal contacts as needed make sound business decisions based on credit risk policy and procedures perform high volume time sensitive tasks related to the loan documentation process which includes researching and problem solving to ensure compliance with customer loyalty quality and timeliness standards this role requires solid proficiency for processing government conforming and or non conforming loans proficient in collateral review communication interaction is typically non scripted developing and maintaining relationships with all involved parties this role is the main contact point for the customer throughout their loan process requesting and gathering all required documentation while ensuring a high level of customer service is consistently provided also required is the ability to analyze complex loan transactions regular and consistent communication with both the customer and the hmc is an integral part of this position

Title: collector team lead
Description: wells fargo card services recovery department a division of the wells fargo consumer credit solutions is searching for an extremely motivated and dynamic team lead for our in house recovery unit this person will join a team of dedicated hard working professionals who passionately strive and take action to mitigate losses and minimize impact to the bank this position s schedule will be monday friday from 8 00 am to 5 00 pm with one night per week 12 00 pm to 9 00 pm and an occasional saturday morning the individual seeking this position will be responsible for coordinating and motivating daily activity of a collection team and will also have a higher level of decision making authority when working accounts the successful candidate will also provide training on policies and procedures research and provide guidance to resolve the most complex problems other duties include working delinquent accounts and assisting with compiling statistical reports and other special projects while maintaining and collecting half of a file of their own duties include ¢resolving escalated issues and communicating with customers other departments and external organizations ¢recommending processes to maximize efficiency of operations ¢take action to recover losses and minimize impact to the bank ¢work with the supervisor to identify problems and improve collection efforts ¢will be assigned a group of direct reports ¢maintain and collect partial file

Title: branch sales manager safe
Description: together we ll go far wells fargo home mortgage is the nations leading mortgage lender we are driven to provide exceptional home loan service to consumers and business partners with a strong nationwide branch network we strive to offer the very best platforms technology tools and compensation at wells fargo we foster an inclusive customer focused work environment where innovation is encouraged and performance rewarded we invest in you develop your talents and help you maximize your potential if we want to be successful in today s world we must be as diverse in every respect as the customers and communities we serve we have an immediate opening for a branch sales manager this individual is responsible for directing and managing the sales activities of a branch of residential home mortgage consultants typically 8 ensuring profitability market share growth and a high level of customer service also responsible for producing high quality loans that meet wells fargo home mortgage guidelines by building relationships with realtors builders financial planners bank stores past customers and other nontraditional source while providing excellent customer service strong sales and organizational skills are essential bi lingual job seekers are encouraged to apply additional duties include ¢ develop knowledge of company products policies and procedures and underwriting requirements ¢ understand real estate appraisals title reports and real estate transactions ¢ inform prospective and existing customers of wfhm programs rates policies underwriting requirements and loan procedures ¢ analyze detailed financial and credit data matching customer needs with an appropriate loan program and level of risk ¢ receive customer applications quote the rate and points and complete follow up activities with the registration lock in ¢ develop and maintains a high degree of visibility for wfhm in the marketplace ¢ perform miscellaneous duties as needed and required

Title: personal banker safe training program kenai peninsula
Description: this position is will be located in the kenai peninsula market and will be 40 hours per week do you enjoy working in a fast paced retail sales environment like providing expert advice find satisfaction in offering the right financial solutions to your customers like to have clear cut goals and take pride in exceeding them want frequent recognition and rewards for top performance we are currently looking for top notch sales and service leaders to join the personal banker training program this program provides on the job and classroom training candidates who successfully complete the program will be placed into personal banker positions throughout the kenai peninsula including homer this program is a great opportunity for our team members to advance in their careers with wells fargo our bankers have exciting opportunities to learn about the financial services industry through partnering with all our lines of business responsibilities include selling retail banking products and services to customers and prospects managing customer s portfolios servicing relationships and cross selling all products and services providing a broad base of financial and credit services with the goals of acquiring 100 of the customers business developing and maintaining relationships with wells fargo partners to maximize sales opportunities and achieve minimum sales standards gaining new customers through outbound calls in person and telephone and partner referrals using profiling analysis tools to identify cross sell opportunities and make outbound sales calls typically by phone to increase product per customer ratio this position requires compliance with the s a f e mortgage licensing act of 2008 and all related regulations ongoing employment is contingent upon meeting all such requirements including acceptable background investigation results

Title: phone banker 1
Description: are you seeking a new and rewarding challenge within the same great company if so visit jobs to learn more about the phone banker position we offer a competitive salary set schedules and extensive training it just might be the fit you ve been waiting for ¢ a phone banker spends nearly 100 of his her time on the phone answering questions for wells fargo customers an excellent phone banker will be able to handle 100 120 calls per day while maintaining a high level of customer satisfaction the working environment is fun and relaxed with a casual dress code but is also demanding and structured and involves overcoming customers banking concerns which can include some escalated issues ¢ phone bankers are expected to sell products and services and achieve aggressive sales expectations which are measured daily our best phone bankers thrive on customer interaction and never miss an opportunity to enhance the customer relationship with wells fargo by marketing new products and services they always handle each customer with a friendly courteous touch while following strict procedures for handling various types of inquiries ¢ we provide our phone bankers with continuous coaching and development which not only enhances their ability to provide exemplary service and product solutions to our customers but also enhances the phone bankers career growth our successful bankers demonstrate self motivation a positive attitude have the ability to work well on a team and have a solid work history they also demonstrate strong listening written and verbal communication skills they are receptive to coaching and feedback have the desire to meet exceed expectations and solve problems while working in a fast paced environment ¢ our phone bankers play a critical role in our customers lives therefore predictable and reliable attendance is an essential function of the position ¢ we know you enjoy building those lasting relationships with customers this role takes you to a new level and keeps you challenged so if this is what you re looking for complete your online profile and link it to this requisition salary 11 86 12 37 hourly rate is the minimum and potential to earn sales incentive based on performance

Description: our vision is to satisfy all our customers financial needs help them succeed financially be known as one of america s great companies and the number one financial services provider in each of our markets come join us tellers are the face of our company and represent wells fargo in the community a teller position with our team offers an opportunity to be part of one of america s greatest companies you ll have exposure to a variety of responsibilities people and experiences in a professional work environment that s part of the fun our expectation of our tellers tellers introduce customers to new products and services and generate leads for other members of the sales team to close every teller has her his own scorecard with goals our best tellers constantly go the extra mile to greet customers make them feel welcome and also engage customers to learn about their financial needs an excellent teller processes between 20 25 customer transactions each hour with no mistakes through patience attention to detail and the ability to follow procedures every teller is responsible for maintaining and balancing a cash drawer at wells fargo we have an outstanding diverse team we want people who pitch in and help others without being asked and want team members who are committed to the success of the team tellers will develop and improve their skills through training programs and regular feedback discussions with supervisors which will help further their professional experience and improve their chances for even greater roles in the future a teller position is the start of something really big with an organization the size of wells fargo there is no limit to what a truly motivated person can become with a little dedication and time wells fargo believes in developing people

Title: regbkg sr ag industry spec
Description: responsible for soliciting and or developing and maintaining profitable account relationships with more complex and large sized business accounts in agricultural lending and or agribusiness solicits the most complex customers in their industry area and has increased lending authority acts as the relationship manager to existing customers determines customer s commercial loan and deposit needs and deepens existing customer relationships act as the customer s advocate in securing suitable credit and cross sells products and services requires minimal supervision and may provide guidance to other business relationship managers requires advanced knowledge of their industry segment

Title: loan administration manager 2 area underwriting closing manage
Description: the area underwriting closing manager will support an area through the management of underwriters and closers specific responsibilities of this position are lead the activities and or operations of a loan a production team responsible for customer service underwriting and closing documentation provide escalation support between sales teams and external vendors and customers to ensure team is effective in the administration of each loan closing underwriting transaction ensure loan closing underwriting transactions are completed appropriately and in a timely manner provide updates and reporting as appropriate to regional underwriting closing manager as it relates to the performance of the closing underwriting functions participate in strategic planning discussions for the fulfillment site and provide recommendations regarding future direction management accountabilities lead and manage staff of 10 25 non exempt direct report team members in multiple loan administration teams for a defined operations group team members under direct reporting structure encompass managers and individual contributors responsible for or participates in the hiring coaching developing and supervising of team members including decisions relative to performance reviews terminations hires discipline salary actions etc influence performance of a business unit or functional area by working as part of the decision making management team with responsibility for managing the budget of the team department or unit

Title: phone banker 1
Description: a phone banker spends nearly 100 of his her time on the phone answering questions for wells fargo customers an excellent phone banker will be able to handle 100 120 calls per day while maintaining a high level of customer satisfaction the working environment is fun and relaxed with a casual dress code but is also demanding and structured and involves overcoming customers banking concerns which can include some escalated issues phone bankers are expected to sell products and services and achieve aggressive sales goals which are measured daily our best phone bankers thrive on customer interaction and never miss an opportunity to enhance the customers relationship with wells fargo by marketing new products and services they always handle each customer with a friendly courteous touch while following strict procedures for handling various types of inquiries we provide our phone bankers with continuous coaching and development which not only enhances their ability to provide exemplary service and product solutions to our customers but also enhances the phone bankers career growth our successful bankers demonstrate self motivation a positive attitude have the ability to work well on a team and have a solid work history they also demonstrate strong listening written and verbal communication skills they are receptive to coaching and feedback have the desire to meet exceed goals and solve problems while working in a fast paced environment our phone bankers play a critical role in our customers lives therefore predictable and reliable attendance is an essential function of the position

Title: wm investment manager 2 portfolio manager
Description: nelson capital management a rapidly growing ria located in palo alto is a wholly owned subsidiary of wells fargo the investment manager will be primarily responsible for implementing investment strategies approved by the investment committee for a group of clients manages moderately complex investment portfolios in a fiduciary capacity the investment manager acting independently within established investment policy guidelines manages medium to large size client accounts for both high net worth clients and institutional relationships in conjunction with the relationship manager the investment manager utilizes a consulting approach to execute investment strategies utilizing individual securities equities bonds etfs pooled vehicles open ended mutual funds and alternative investments where applicable to optimize the relevant risk and reward profile the clients situation warrants the investment manager also performs investment research keeps informed of developments in investment management industry and confers with tax attorneys accountants etc to determine and assess consequences of investment decisions and resolve account problems nelson capital is a small firm where individuals must be self motivated and actively seek additional responsibilities and learning opportunities

Title: business process analyst 2
Description: this position is in the default procedures department of the loss control technology solutions group this team provides process analysis and technical writing for procedural support for the bankruptcy and foreclosure departments the business process analyst 2 position will be responsible for the following functions ¢lead a large project as it relates to process and procedures ¢produce follow and update a detailed project plan and schedule from start to finish maintain a comprehensive understanding of various software applications needed to create business processes and procedures ¢collaborates with implementation change control project management and business unit teams to ensure all processes and procedures achieve the need of the business unit and are of the highest quality and accuracy ¢consult with vendors to identify specific training needs that are within the scope of the project and share that communication and needs with the learning development department to create highly executable training from the business processes and procedures ¢collaborate and communicate with impacted business lines to maintain strong relationships and ensure the accurate usage of the application and ensure its long term success complete significant process analysis by reading procedures and system requirements become an expert in the processes and procedures assigned ¢redesign process workflows as necessary to adapt to product service or technology changes ¢create update and maintain manage all business unit procedures ¢share feedback and measurement results with appropriate stakeholders ¢provide timely updates to business line customers and project leadership team as appropriate ¢evaluates the training programs and procedures for effectiveness and ease of use ¢consults with the business in the most ethical and legal manner to ensure perfection with process and procedure details legal requirements and internal compliance

Title: personal banker safe 1
Description: our vision is to satisfy all our customers financial needs help them succeed financially be known as one of america s great companies and the number one financial services provider in each of our markets come join us as a personal banker you will devote much of your day to building long term relationships with our customers in person and by phone you will deepen the understanding of our customers financial needs and provide suggestions while most of the job is performed in the stores bankers reach out into the community by placing outbound phone calls to existing clients visiting businesses conducting educational seminars and being active in the community our expectation of our personal bankers personal bankers are expected to exceed challenging sales and referral goals by proactively selling products and services to customers and referring customers to other areas of the bank personal bankers sell retail banking products and services to customers and prospects manages customer portfolio services relationships and cross sells all products and services provides broad base of financial and credit services with the goals of acquiring 100 of the customers business develops and maintains relationships with wells fargo partners to maximize sales opportunities and achieve minimum sales standards uses profiling analysis tools to identify cross sell opportunities and makes outbound sales calls typically by phone to increase product per customer ratio may handle cash transactions may spend up to 30 of time completing service related tasks every banker has their own scorecard with daily sales and referral goals you will be rewarded for your success with bonus incentives beyond base salary our best bankers constantly go the extra mile finding ways to be helpful while still working quickly and efficiently bankers have the ability to resolve difficult customer situations effectively while delivering friendly customer service and ensuring the highest level of customer satisfaction at wells fargo we have an outstanding diverse team we want people who pitch in and help others enhance their ability to educate our customers we ll provide outstanding training but it s up to you to learn our products and services personal bankers will develop and improve their skills through regular feedback discussions with supervisors and learn skills which will help further their professional experience and improve their chance for even greater roles in the future this position requires compliance with the s a f e mortgage licensing act of 2008 and all related regulations ongoing employment is contingent upon meeting all such requirements including acceptable background investigation results

Title: phone banker
Description: a phone banker spends nearly 100 of his her time on the phone answering questions for wells fargo customers the working environment is fun and relaxed with a casual dress code but is also demanding and structured and involves overcoming customers banking concerns which can include some escalated issues phone bankers are expected to sell products and services and achieve aggressive sales goals which are measured daily our best phone bankers thrive on customer interaction and never miss an opportunity to enhance the customer s relationship with wells fargo by marketing new products and services they always handle each customer with a friendly courteous touch while following strict procedures for handling various types of inquiries we provide our phone bankers with continuous coaching and development which not only enhances their ability to provide exemplary service and product solutions to our customers but also enhances the phone bankers career growth our successful bankers demonstrate self motivation a positive attitude have the ability to work well on a team and have a solid work history they also demonstrate strong listening written and verbal communication skills they are receptive to coaching and feedback have the desire to meet exceed goals and solve problems while working in a fast paced environment our phone bankers play a critical role in our customers lives therefore predictable and reliable attendance is an essential function of the position must be available to attend a full time 6 week paid training course beginning on may 29 2012 training schedule is monday through friday hours are tbd work schedules after training are tbd ¢ salary starts between 10 66 11 59 hr depending on experience

Title: tooling design process engineer
Description: tooling design process engineer basic purpose design document and implement tools fixtures dies equipment and processes required in the manufacturing of busbar power products functional scope responsible for designing tools and process for a variety of power products designs may be highly complex and interactive essential duties responsibilities provide technical guidance to improve safety and reduce costs of new and existing processes perform dfm and design reviews develop production tooling and processes to ensure product performance requirements are met design tooling and equipment that is easily maintained reliable safe and cost effective provide designs for complex precision and non standard products and processes that ensure consistent quality and ease of manufacturability develop concepts and designs for tooling that can provide a competitive advantage manage tooling and machine projects to ensure timely and cost effective implementation provide technical guidance and hands on assistance to troubleshoot and debug equipment and processes ensure tooling and equipment is effectively implemented and maintained provide technical support and guidance to suppliers and support groups provide training and documentation on the use and maintenance of new equipment and tooling effectively utilize current design and drawing software and equipment standardize on tooling and machinery to ensure flexibility assist manufacturing engineering in problem solving recommend and initiate action to prevent the occurrence of product nonconformity recommend and initiate design solutions through designated channels verify the implementation of solutions and process improvements understand and follow applicable company practices policies and procedures work safely moderate travel

Title: assistant supervisor hvac
Description: warren wilson college seeks candidates for an assistant supervisor hvac the assistant supervisor is responsible for assisting the hvac supervisor in establishing and maintaining the hvac and control systems on campus he she also trains supervises and works with a student work crew in operating and maintaining the systems

Title: director of safety executive position
Description: centennial inc has recently been engaged by a world leader in the freight forwarding transportation and logistics industry to identify and recruit a director of safety the director of safety leads oversees and influences the safety security and compliance for our client company creating a safe secure culture throughout the united states and global areas as a strategic thought leader the director of safety will develop and provide tools education measurements and implement safety standards this role will provide fact based information to ensure our client company continually improves the work environment for employees their clients and the general public primary responsibilities oversees safety security and compliance and on going monitoring to ensure safety and security provide thought leadership regarding safety and security for the field operations with the vision of safety and security assuring they become ingrained in the culture ensures compliance with all federal state and local requirements including department of transportation dot and department of environmental quality deq develops and implements safety standards provide the path tools education materials measures and fact based information to ensure continual improvement and working environment for employees clients and general public develops and implements programs intended to reduce or eliminate occupational injuries and financial losses identifies and appraises conditions which could result in accidents injuries and financial losses develops accident prevention loss control systems and programs for incorporation into operational policies and procedures of the organization coordinates safety activities throughout entire organization compiles analyzes and interprets statistical data related to exposure factors concerning occupational illnesses and accidents maintains and revises safety security plans threat assessments and substance abuse policies consistent with dot and government regulations keeps current on all safety regulations files and maintains safety documents consistent with company and government procedures client facing responsibilities when necessary on going resource for world class service reports to coo with indirect reporting to vp of risk management requirements ten years ™ experience of related safety compliance experience in freight and logistics experience in building a safety program and culture from the ground up able to travel to other work locations working knowledge of distribution transportation and supply chain effective facilitator member and involved in asse thoroughly knowledgeable of dot deq and osha regulations knowledgeable on workers ™ compensation processes training and certification in hazardous materials and hazardous material clean up training and certification in first aid highly organized able to maintain orderly file required education certification bachelor ™s degree required masters in occupational safety strongly preferred csp certified safety professiona all resumes will be accepted with the strictest confidence if you have any questions please contact becky scheeler becky centennialinc com or 513 366 3768 since 1975 centennial inc s mission has stayed the same connecting business leaders with the best talent and resources to improve their businesses careers and personal lives organizations and leaders turn to centennial because they know they can trust our team to deliver results centennial inc focuses on attracting recruiting developing engaging and retaining top talent and executive leadership for organizations experiencing change and growth visit our website and connect with us http www centennialinc com

Description: benchmark is currently looking for a maintenance mechanic for a food production company in morgan hill this is a temporary to direct hire position requirements mandatory plc must have 3 5 years of experience working in a food production plant maintain and repair production equipment willing to work overtime and weekends as needed machine setup and operate allen bradley experience a plus able to lift 50 pounds

Title: electro plater
Description: benchmark staffing is currently looking for a plating specialist in the printed board circuit industry for a company in santa clara requirements 3 years of plating experience in the printed circuit board industry must be able to manually plate the following types electro deposited nickel gold tin tin lead copper silver will assist in processing of the printed circuit boards

Title: contracts administrator
Description: contracts administrator smoky mountain center for mental health developmental disabilities and substance abuse services 44 bonnie lane sylva nc 28779 www smokymountaincenter org 828 586 5501 contracts administrator western region general statement of job the primary purpose of this position is to ensure that financial requirements and obligations are accurately identified in both provider contracts and administrative contracts essential job functions this position is responsible for ensuring all financial information in provider contracts is accurate this position will work to identify all financial reporting requirements of the contractor including making financial assistance determinations prior to execution of the contract this position will determine smc s financial payment arrangements for specific contracts and ensure that the descriptive payment language within the document is accurate this position will maintain a list of all provider reporting requirements for each contract and ensure that those requirements are being met on an ongoing basis this position will also generate administrative contracts and maintain administrative contracts database to include contract requests tracking of contract status receipt of w 9 s address changes termination of contracts position will be cross trained within the accounting department to act as a back up to certain accounting functions position may also perform accounting functions that increase segregation of duties within the department on a reoccurring basis

Title: electronic assembly start asap
Description: must be proficient with test instruments such as oscilloscope multi meter and safety analyzers soldering experience is preferred assembly desoldering and rework qualified candidates should possess a minimum of 1 year experience with small parts interested candidates should contact benchmark immediately for consideration at 562 356 1035

Title: quality assurance inspector
Description: are you an experienced quality assurance specialist here is a great opportunity to work with one of southern california s largest garment distributor the q a inspector is responsible for conducting audit and inspection functions for the distribution center identify and communicate any potential or existing problems concerning incoming product quality identify problems and potential concerns relative to the quality of the items being inspected and learn to apply statistical process monitoring techniques to incoming products other duties to include but not limited to 1 ability to read and apply product specifications drawing measurements and tolerances 2 maintaining a high level of personal safety awareness by participating in activities relating to personnel and company safety programs 3 understanding use of statistical process control techniques is a plus 4 performing testing inspection of products with measuring tools use calculator and report results in effective manner 5 maintain reports and records for inspected products 6 ability to communicate effectively 7 ability to work effectively with minimal supervision 8 ability to master use of sampling tables and computerized reporting systems 9 resourcefulness in investigating quality issues and problems if you meet all the requirements please submit your resume now for immediate consideration

Title: microscope mechanical assemblers
Description: currently looking for hard working microscope mechanical assemblers for an aerospace company in san juan capistrano candidates need to have the following skill sets watch maker type skills small part assembly microscope assembly must be able to use screw drivers wire crimpers and cutters must be able to record data experience in aerospace and high tech industries a plus must be able to build a product over a long period of time and build other products simultaneously must be able to communicate in english what job duties they performed previously essential functions and basic duties 1 receive parts materials and instructions from lead person or supervisor 2 review shop traveler route card or uncomplicated schematic drawing to confirm correct sequence of operation 3 position very small parts such as ceramic board crystals gages fine pins fire wire solder particles and epoxy under binocular microscope using tweezers or positioning fixtures 4 adjust bend align and solder find wires to resistors and base parts 5 bond or seal parts or assemblies with epoxies using direct heating elements or ovens 6 performs a variety of in process testing 7 these essential function and basic duties may vary depending on assigned production area 8 hazardous waste handler key performance metrics 1 accuracy 2 productivity 3 on time delivery only candidates with required skills will be considered qualified candidates only should contact benchmark immediately for consideration at 562 356 1035

Title: cnc mazak setup programmer mazatrol

work specifications and quality standards and perform related duties as assigned ¢set up operate and adjust controls on cnc lathes in accordance with engineering specifications production drawings production procedures and oral instructions ¢check work in progress and upon completion for adherence to work specifications ¢conformance to quality standards and safe operating conditions ¢change settings for various production runs ¢obtain work supplies from tool crib as needed ¢clean and maintain work areas and equipment ¢complete work records and use hand tools as needed ¢implement most affective method to set up and complete a specific job and use time as efficiently as possible ¢and may deburr parts in completing production work qualifications guidelines any combination equivalent of but not limited to the following experience training education ability to set up and machine the first part to blueprint specifications for first article inspection minimum 2 years experience and
