and techniques for operating cnc lathes and related hand tools and equipment ¢knowledge of safe equipment operating procedures and work practices ¢knowledge of proper fluid levels and coolant recovery skill in setting up and maintenance procedures ¢operating and adjusting equipment control settings for cnc lathes ¢ability to check machined parts for conformity with work specifications and quality standards ¢ability to read and interpret production blueprints and specifications operating procedures and machine parts listings ¢ability to communicate and work cooperatively with others ¢and ability to ensure efficient operation of equipment and hand tools physical requirements ability to bend reach lift move and carry tools and materials weighing 25 pounds or less special requirements steel toe safety work shoes required

Title: general warehouse
Description: benchmark is actively recruiting warehouse associates for a major logistics company in and around anaheim this position will entail a mixture of warehouse duties shrink wrapping and loading candidates will be pulling product from a conveyor placing it on a pallets and shrink wrapping the product they will also be required to load and unload product qualified candidates should be physically capable of repetitive lifting bending and stooping and should have previous work experience in a warehouse environment this is a long term opportunity which offers room for growth interested applicants should contact our office immediately as appointments for interviews are limited this job will fill quickly contact a staffing manager at 562 356 1035 and submit your resume via careerbuilder for preferred consideration

Title: maintenance electrician w vfd experience
Description: we are looking for an electrical technician experience troubleshooting up to 480 volts ac dc single three phase systems motor controls and drives process automation controls vfd s plc s servo motors and temperature controllers natural gas combustion burners gas trains and electrical circuit board components testing repair replacement lighting systems installing new electrical systems and various sensoring equiptment familiarity with nec iee ul and nfpa 70e safety codes able to work overtime when required fast paced setting good communication skills

Title: production planner inventory control
Description: job description this position is responsible for maintaining adequate stocking levels of purchased items raw materials that support the uninterrupted manufacture and shipment of all finished goods for the plant this includes identifying current and forecasted inventory levels as compared to expected demand and procuring all materials necessary to meet business needs by proficiently using established planning systems and processes the duties of this position also include use of the erp system to plan the daily weekly scheduling load of the workcenters for the wood metal division of production based upon capacity essential duties and responsibilities lead the process of inventory reduction by developing and maintain materials stocking safety stock levels which both support customer service objectives and production and sales deviations while minimizing the corporate inventory investment and supporting operating plans compiles data using information from the computer system such as open customer orders purchase order history inventory back orders and historical data concerning shipments usage and sales analyzes and organizes on hand inventory and demand data to develop a plan for the stocking of purchased raw materials advise buyer on planned purchases works with plant supervisor and other resources as appropriate to develop and maintain material stocking targets revises the stocking levels as sales and inventory requirements change inputs stocking levels reorder points case quantities and order min and max quantities as needed into the system create maintain and ensure execution of the production schedule to enable production to meet the objectives of the site own and maintain detailed daily weekly production schedule conducts cycle count and manage the annual physical inventory maintain inventory accuracy in high level supports processing of receiving documents and invoice review job requirements education and or experience bachelor ™s degree or manufacturing production experience five or more years related experience and or training as a buyer planner or scheduler in a manufacturing environment demonstrated experience with inventory control experience with use of planning tools and systems such as an mrp system as well as work in an erp system is required experience with wood metal production a strong plus

Title: shipping receiving clerk with ups fedex worldship experience
Description: seeking a shipping clerk with ups worldship and fed ex online experience for a growing distribution center the selected candidate will be confirming orders with clients taking orders verifying shipments directing warehouse staff and dealing with clients and suppliers this position is paperwork and phone intensive and will require someone with an excellent presence and an acute attention to detail qualified candidates will be computer literate and have knowledge of all shipping carriers must have international shipping experience pay 10

Title: filament winding
Description: position title production operator filament winding and or rotomold reporting to production supervisor job purpose to work in a professional manner using guidelines set up by the company be able to work to production schedule to ensure on time delivery to the customer job duties and responsibilities filament winding experience on tubing cylinders mclean anderson entec software experience a plus rotomold operation resin mixing background a plus be able to provide input to designers engineers with respect to changes on wind patterns knowledge of using assembly tools fixtures and equipment assemble and ship products on time which meets or exceeds specification demonstrate problem solving abilities take direction and follow instructions able to work shift hours as required knowledge of electromechanical assembly process understanding of high pressure gases 3600 “ 15 000 psi i e nitrogen hydrogen and helium understanding of data acquisition and test instrumentation knowledge in using electromechanical pneumatics and hydraulic automation display manual dexterity to assemble systems per engineering drawing requirements understand and prepare input to work procedures with accuracy proficient in english to communicate with fellow employees and follow work instructions demonstrate maturity and tact while working in team environment or independently adopt and implement the quality assurance procedures qap and departmental work instructions dwi identified in qems employee training matrix located on the lan education and or experience required high school diploma or equivalent preferred asme y14 5 drawing reading knowledge preferred automobile mechanic experience and ability to operate a forklift also a plus a quality management system knowledge and working experience a plus physical job requirements this is primarily a production position with employee working in a production environment while performing the duties of this job the employee is regularly required to operate various equipment and machinery they are required to stand walk or sit reach with hands and arms stoop kneel and crouch specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision distance vision peripheral vision depth perception and ability to focus this position involves occasionally lifting up to 25 50 pounds

Title: sales representative
Description: allied oil tire co this well established regional distributor of nationally branded tires and lubricants has an opening for a seasoned sales professional in the des moines area this unique individual will have proven themself capable of establishing and maintaining excellent customer relationships experience selling to truck fleets is preferred the qualified candidate will ¢ compile lists of prospective customers for use as sales leads based on information from existing customers industry ads trade shows and other sources ¢ travel through assigned territory to call on current and prospective customers to solicit orders or talk with customers by phone ¢ quote prices and credit terms and prepare sales contracts for orders ¢ enter new and current customer information into computer database high growth potential in a fast paced environment is available to the individual seeking a challenging and rewarding position if you are a proven professional with a history of providing solutions for your customer send resume and salary history to bgreim allied oil com allied oil tire co is an equal opportunity employer

Title: sr database administrator
Description: essential functions maintain and monitor microsoft sql server databases provide technical support for the database environment including development and organization of the databases provide analysis and implementation of new technologies develop long term plan for database technology aligned with business opportunities facing the company work with architecture application development and operations to help achieve a state of the art environment that meets current and evolving business objectives train and support the technical support and application development staff to utilize the databases environment develop a methodology for the ongoing assessment of database performance and the identification of problem areas work with others in it to build the logical database and provide technical guidance during all phases of the development process performs other duties from time to time as requested by their supervisor or as business needs dictate work environment adheres to all policies and procedures attends work on time required to call in to report an absence no less than two hours prior to the start of the shift by contacting the supervisor directly and stating reason for absence minimizes safety hazards by following all safety rules and procedures maintain confidentiality of all employee customer and company information maintain forty 40 hours per week performance level plus additional hours as job requires required to be available after hours by pager or cell phone must respond to after hour calls

Title: rn clinical coordinator ticu 107681
Description: department ticu trauma icu trauma intensive care shift night hours per pay period 72 shift hours 12hour facility mercy san juan medical center as part of a level ii trauma center the ticu unit is an exciting fast paced 8 bed unit caring for critically ill trauma patients including both blunt and penetrating injuries be a part of this spacious state of the art unit that opened in 1999 and has a team approach to patient care ticu has 24 hour physician coverage and daily rounds are made with the entire healthcare team the staff is all registered nurses with trauma nurse critical care tncc certification applicants must be comfortable with caring for critically ill trauma patients handle equipment like icp and evd monitoring devices and be a team player with good communication skills candidates need to have critical thinking skills and be able to care for very critically injured patients with both blunt and penetrating injuries mercy san juan medical center is a nationally recognized not for profit hospital located in carmichael california serving the areas of north sacramento county and south placer county it is one of the region ™s largest and most comprehensive medical centers dedicated to the community ™s well being our 2 100 employees 430 medical staff and 270 volunteers provide excellence in care for more than 150 000 patients each year mercy san juan medical center consistently receives national attention for the high quality care we provide recent recognition includes u s news world report ™s list of 2011 best regional hospitals and 2012 recognition from a national ratings organization that includes excellence award in critical care america ™s 100 best in critical care excellence award in neurosurgery and 5 star ratings in copd sepsis pneumonia pulmonary embolism respiratory failure neurosurgery stroke bowel obstruction and total knee replacement founded in 1967 mercy san juan is growing with the community a six story patient tower opened in december 2009 adding 110 beds and bringing the total size of the hospital to 370 acute care beds the tower offers patients private comfortable rooms state of the art technology and the latest health care interior design elements to provide a soothing healing environment among the medical services we provide are ¢one of the sacramento area ™s leading level ii trauma centers recognized nationally as a leader in trauma care ¢a level iii neonatal intensive care unit ranked among the world ™s elite for survival rates of premature infants ¢ a comprehensive cardiac program that is part of the mercy heart and vascular institute including cardiac surgery cardiac catheterization and cardiac rehabilitation ¢the mercy neurological institute of northern california and primary stroke center ¢the mercy cancer institute including nurse navigation and dedicated teams of specialists ¢the latest da vinci robotic surgical system with more robotic specialties offered than any other hospital in the region ¢the only mako robotic orthopedic surgery program in the region to provide partial knee resurfacing ¢a comprehensive lung esophageal center with highly specialized diagnosis and sophisticated surgical treatments as we embrace opportunities for enhancement and growth we are eager to find professionals who share our vision ready to fulfill your life ™s purpose please take a moment to discover more about what it is like to work here by visiting www mercysanjuan org because our employees are our most valuable assets we offer great benefits career growth flexibility training and leadership development benefits package highlights ¢free medical dental and vision plan for full and part time employees and family ¢100 employer paid retirement plan Title: html css web designer
Description: the web designer is responsible for the development and design of major and minor web applications and components for external site users the designer will conceptualize and design applications and website components enhancements and defect resolution will be required on an ongoing basis best practices and design methods will be utilized to insure the success of the projects the designer will have the ability to create web applications and components from the requirements stage through design through production deployment they will be required to have experience in graphics layout user experience design and basic programming flexibility adaptability and the ability to learn quickly in various technical and creative environments while delivering quality work by tight deadlines are key attributes of this individual principal accountabilities operates effectively as a member of the creative team also operates effectively as an individual for quick turnaround of enhancements and fixes responsible for meeting expectations and deliverables on time and in high quality responsible for the design of web applications and components responsible for the design of web pages graphics multimedia guis utilizes storyboarding and graphic pre designs where appropriate demonstrates creative technical and analytical skills demonstrates ability to communicate effectively in both technical and business environments

Title: national software sales director
Description: national software sales director the client is based in jackson mississippi but if you live near any major airport in the southeast you will be considered this position is responsible for the development and performance of all national account sales activities may staff and direct sales team members and provide leadership towards the achievement of maximum profitability and growth in line with company vision and values in most instances works with other divisional staff to facilitate new customer selling activity as well as selling to current customers establishes plans and strategies to expand the customer base in the marketing area and contributes to the development of training and educational programs for clients and account executives duties and responsibilities sells directly with customers and prospects as defined by clients national account policy definitions responsible for annual quota attainment per an annual compensation plan provided by the vp sales and marketing identifies business opportunities by identifying prospects and evaluating their position in the industry researching and analyzing sales options sells products by establishing contact and developing relationships with prospects recommending solutions maintains relationships with clients by providing information and guidance researching and recommending new opportunities recommending profit and service improvements identifies product improvements or new products by remaining current on industry trends market activities and competitors such recommendations should be submitted to the vp sales and marketing in writing for presentation to the aht product design team prepares reports by collecting analyzing and summarizing information to include a monthly national accounts sales report due for the monthly officers meeting maintains quality service by establishing and enforcing organization standards maintains professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops reviewing professional publications establishing personal networks benchmarking state of the art practices participating in professional societies develops a business plan and sales strategy for the market that ensures attainment of company sales goals and profitability prepares action plans by individuals as well as by team for effective search of sales leads and prospects initiates and coordinates development of action plans to penetrate new markets assists in the development and implementation of marketing plans as needed provides timely accurate competitive pricing on all completed prospect applications submitted for pricing and approval while striving to maintain maximum profit margin creates and conducts proposal presentations and rfp responses adheres to all company policies procedures and business ethics codes and ensures that they are communicated and implemented may recruit test and hire additional staff based on criteria agreed upon by senior management

Title: project manager
Description: project manager boston we re seeking an energetic ambitious and motivated project manager program manager who is a master of managing ecommerce projects teams and deliverables the project manager will be managing key projects for large well known clients our clients include walmart coach bloomingdales macy s puma rue la la here are some of the top skills for the project manager the ideal candidate has professional services experience managing projects with technologists strategists and creative resources experience working in a fixed price fixed time environment agile experience pmp pmi not required experience in the ecommerce space and familiarity with back office integrations if you have this experience please make it clear on your resume as this is a key differentiator a real people manager who has managed projects with internal and external techies technical architects developers ux people business analysts etc the project manager will be the glue between these teams someone who has managed projects for large clients ideally retail ecommerce clients summary project managers orchestrate drive lead client projects using our proven agile delivery approach the optaros assembly methodology optam project managers shape client engagements to define the scope and effort of all of our projects a project manager leads project teams project managers manage the client relationship at the senior level and have a high level of commitment to client success 6 years experience on technical project teams or in product development or professional services environments in support or delivery related roles 3 years in project leadership roles experience in custom application development and all phases of the software development lifecycle sdlc experience in planning organizing and executing projects of varying complexity delivering them within specified timeframes and budgets previous experience managing projects of similar size in a systems integration environment ability to define and ensure objective measures of complex programs and experience in tracking and assessing projects based on project plans budgets and resources experience in one of more of the following business solutions media and publishing consumer products e commerce on line customer support knowledge management and collaboration interest in and passion for web development and open source software e g jboss mysql apache lamp alfresco rapid iteration experience crm experience working knowledge of php java python is a plus understanding of broad aspects of project management systems analysis training infrastructure code development testing experience leading requirements gathering sessions and establishing task prioritization extensive understanding of fixed price project planning and delivery is a plus experience guiding hiring training and employee development practices within a team and project based environment consulting experience motivated to drive excellence in service delivery methodology and operations track record of managing successful projects ability to manage client expectations and manage scope throughout the lifecycle of the project constantly and consistently communicate with the client and schedule hold and lead client meetings as necessary the ability to identify key influencers on the client side and develop a strong partnership throughout the lifecycle of the project ability to partner with technical architects and technical leads to understand and communicate the technical foundation of each project bias and ability to partner with the client and team to problem solve expert level experience in analyzing business goals and metrics understanding best practices while maintaining clients ™ strategic direction able to meet or exceed established revenue goals business development and utilization excellent communicator facilitation presentation verbal and written culture fit flexibility is key must be open to adapting past experience to actual optaros engagements self directed and resourceful with the ability to thrive in a fast paced environment of continual change interest in collaborating across the company to share knowledge and learn from others participating in internal training workshops on related topics and an overall desire to contribute to the project management practice across the company interest in playing an active leadership role in continuously improving optaros delivery practices and enthusiasm for maintaining optaros ™ presence in os online communities blogs and forums assume a hands on role in developing talent across the company and in building optaros ™ brand externally problem solving teamwork transparent communications self directed management style and quest for constant learning are the key behaviors that drive success at optaros must have developed skill and bias towards action in all of the above willingness to travel to client sites as required is this you if so please apply we welcome your application email sronzetti optaros com

Title: branch manager
Description: with a fleet of over 10 000 units and a branch network of 20 locations across 12 states acton mobile industries provides modular space equipment rental services to the construction commercial education healthcare and government markets acton generates its revenue primarily from rental delivery setup and maintenance services as well as pick up of temporary mobile offices and the sale of new and used units in addition the company is expanding its “jobsite services capabilities in order to provide a broader scope of services for its customers acton offers competitive performance based compensation plans and comprehensive benefits to all full time employees our office environment is both casual and fast paced employees are encouraged to demonstrate initiative take risks and be accountable for the results of their actions we are changing and evolving everyday and are seeking high energy high initiative adaptable individuals to grow with our growing company we are seeking an experienced manager to lead our branch responsibilities and duties monitors and manages all aspects of the branch business and budget including ebitda units on rent average rental rates margins for new and used sales and margins for delivery and setup work maximizes truck and toter utilization and operating profits achieves operational goals set by area vp is responsible for all aspects of branch operations which include ensuring physical inventories are performed monthly and that supplies tools and equipment are properly used maintained and accounted for insures that all units and toters are thoroughly inspected prior to delivery and pickup insures that the branch is compliant with all osha dot and acton safety rules and regulations and abides by all acton rules and procedures provides branch employees with a healthy safe work environment conducts regular branch meetings and safety meetings and inspections interviews hires and reviews job expectations with each new employee ensures all employees are properly trained works directly with employees to set weekly monthly quarterly and annual goals works with branch employees to help them achieve their goals conducts timely performance appraisals encourages and insures participation in regional and local associations supports corporate initiatives and decisions insures that all employees understand embrace and act on the client focus initiatives builds and maintains customer vendor and supplier relationships assists resolves customer issues in a timely manner keeps area vp informed regarding areas of concern promptly communicates information from corporate to the branch personnel manages the prospecting and sales processes and insures all branch prospecting goals are met
